SA20mavt:1: uttamajano hi prāyaśo guruṃ śraddhādevatāṃ cābhyarcyakarmasu pravartata
SA20mavt:3: cikīrṣustatpraṇeturvaktuś ca pūjāṃ kṛtvā tadarthavibhāgāya prayukta
SA20mavt:25: atra sūtrārtho'bhrāntam upadiṣṭa iti vṛttau gauravam utpadyate /
SA20mavt:26: evaṃ ye pudgalaṃ pramāṇīkurvanti teṣāṃ sūtravṛttyo gauravotpattiḥ /
SA20mavt:27: ye ca dharmānusāriṇas teṣāṃ sūtravṛttyoḥ śubhārthā'vabodhaḥ /
SA20mavt:28: jāte ca niścaye iyaṃ praṇeturvaktuś ca pratītyā prabhāvanā na tu
SA20mavt:32: śāstraṃ kim iti cet nāma-pada-vyañjanakāyaprabhāsā vijñaptayaḥ
SA20mavt:46: etac ca dvayam api sarvasmin mahāyāne sarvasmiṃś ca tad vyākhyāne
SA20mavt:59: yadyapy ayaṃ dhātuḥ prāpaṇārthas tathāpi pra-śabdasaṃyogāt
SA20mavt:65: suṣṭhu gataḥ savāsana kleśāvaraṇāj jñeyāvaraṇāc cāpratiṣṭhitaṃ
SA20mavt:76: evaṃ sati bodhisattvasya daśamyāṃ bhūmau pratiṣṭhitasya sarvākāraṃ
SA20mavt:80: atra hi sugatātmajasya śāstrapraṇetur avabodhasampat pradarśitā
SA20mavt:87: tasya hīdaṃ śāstram abhivyaktaṃ ākhyātaṃ cāryamaitreyādhiṣṭhānāt
SA20mavt:90: anyān api buddhabodhisattvānarcayitvā na kevalaṃ praṇetāraṃ
SA20mavt:99: śāstrasya praṇetāraṃ vaktāraṃ cābhyarcya kiṃ kariṣyasītyāha -
SA20mavt:105: ete saptārthā hyasmin śāstra upadiśyanta iti vacanāt /
SA20mavt:112: antarvyāpārapuruṣarahitatā ca dharmanairātmyam ityatas tat pratiṣedhena
SA20mavt:125: taccharīraṃ saṃkṣepaḥ piṇḍārtho vāśrayārthena vā śarīraṃ /
SA20mavt:126: yathā hi bāhyādhyātmikāyatanāśrayaḥ kāyaḥ śarīram ity ucyate evaṃ
SA20mavt:127: yānarthān niścitya śāstraṃ pravartate te'rthās tasya śarīraṃ /
SA20mavt:130: nanu śāstrāvabhodhenaiva taccharīraṃ vijñāsyata iti nirarthakam ādau
SA20mavt:133: gatārtho hi śiṣyaḥ sukhaṃ vistaram ucyamānaṃ pratipādyate /
SA20mavt:151: yadi lakṣyante'neneti laksaṇam ityevaṃ sati lakṣaṇasya
SA20mavt:154: tad yathā pṛthivīdhātuḥ kharalakṣaṇo na ca kharatvāt pṛthivīdhātuḥ
SA20mavt:156: atha vā lakṣyate tad iti lakṣaṇaṃ /
SA20mavt:157: evaṃ hi saṅkleśo vyavadānañca saṅkleśavyavadānātmatvena lakṣyata iti
SA20mavt:159: atha vā dvayoḥ saṅkleśavyavadānayor lakṣaṇaṃ dvividhaṃ svalakṣaṇañca
SA20mavt:166: tadevedaṃ tat tasya bhāvas tattvam aviparyāsa ityarthaḥ /
SA20mavt:184: tataḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yasya yad āvaraṇaṃ tasya taj jñeyaṃ /
SA20mavt:185: tasyāprahāṇād vimukter asambhavād avijñānañca prahātuṃ na śakyate
SA20mavt:187: tatas tadāvaraṇād yenālambanena cittaṃ vimucyate tatttvaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20mavt:188: tatastenālambhanenatadāvaraṇasya yena prayogena kṣayo bhavati sā
SA20mavt:192: tato lokottaradharmābhimukhīkaraṇaṃ phalāni srota apatti phalādīni
SA20mavt:206: tat prahāṇopāyapradarśanārthaṃ tataḥ saparivāraḥ pratipakṣo mārgaḥ /
SA20mavt:210: etac ca sarvaṃ bodhisattvasya śrāvakādisādhāraṇam ity
SA20mavt:214: lakṣaṇaṃ jñātvāvaraṇaṃ prahātavyaṃ tattvaṃ ca sākṣāt kartavyam iti tad
SA20mavt:216: tayoś ca prahāṇasākṣātkaraṇayor ayam upāya iti pratipakṣabhāvanā /
SA20mavt:219: tad anantaraṃ yānānuttaryam iti prakāśanārtham ayam anukrama iti /
SA20mavt:223: tenāvṛtaṃ tattvam iti tattvakauśalārthaṃ tad anantaraṃ tattvaṃ /
SA20mavt:227: avasthayāṃ phalaṃ prabhāvitavyam ityavasthānantaraṃ phalaṃ tat
SA20mavt:229: sarvam etan mahāyānamāgamyeti yānānuttaryam ante nirdiṣṭaṃ //1-1//
SA20mavt:232: śūnyatā vidyate tv atra tasyām api sa vidyate // iti /
SA20mavt:236: lakṣaṇañca prāg uddiṣṭamatastasyaiva śeṣebhyo nirdeśaḥ prāgārabhyate /
SA20mavt:237: kecit virundhanti sarvadharmāḥ sarvathā niḥsvabhāvāḥ śaśaviśāṇavad
SA20mavt:241: nanv evaṃ sūtravirodhaḥ - sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti śāstre vacanāt /
SA20mavt:244: abhūtaparikalpo hi grāhyagrāhakasvarūparahitaḥ śūnya ucyate na tu
SA20mavt:252: iyam eva hi -śūnyatā yā grāhagrāhakarahitatā'bhūtaparikalpasyeti na
SA20mavt:254: yadyadvayā śūnyatā sā cābhūtaparikalpe'sti kasmād vayamamuktāḥ /
SA20mavt:255: vidyamānā ca kasmān na gṛhyata iti saṃśayāpanayanārthaṃ -
SA20mavt:258: yasmācchūnyatāyām apyabhūtaparikalpo vidyate tasmād bhavanto na
SA20mavt:260: ata eva ca samalatvān na prasannābdhātavad gṛhyate /
SA20mavt:261: atha vā cittacaittebhyo'nyatra rūpādayo dravyatvena santīti yad darśanaṃ
SA20mavt:265: nāsti rūpaṃ tad vyatiriktaṃ dravyata iti /
SA20mavt:269: na hy abhūtaparikalpaḥ kasyacid grāhako nāpi kenacit gṛhyate /
SA20mavt:271: yato vijñānād bahī rūpādayo na gṛhyante /
SA20mavt:273: na ca yad yasya kāraṇaṃ tad abhāve tasyotpattir yujyate /
SA20mavt:275: anyatrāpi svabījaparipākād arthābhāsaṃ vijñānam utpadyate ity
SA20mavt:277: grāhyābhāve grāhakasyābhāvād grāhye'sati grāhako bhavituṃ na
SA20mavt:279: tasmān na rūpam abhūtaparikalpāt pṛthag asti /
SA20mavt:286: yady abhūtaparikalpe'sti sā vidyamānā kimarthaṃ na gṛhyate /
SA20mavt:287: abhūtaparikalpāvṛtatvān na gṛhyata ākāśanairmalyavat na tu asattvād
SA20mavt:292: na sarvam asat nāpi sadātmakaṃ vijñānapariṇāmāatmanā'stīti kṛtvā /
SA20mavt:293: ye tu manyante yathaiva rūpādayaḥ prakhyāyante tathiavābhūtaparikalpāt
SA20mavt:294: svabhāvataḥ pṛthag vidyanta iti tān pratyāha
SA20mavt:298: kenacit dvayor abhāvo vo vnadhyāputravat cheda rūpo gṛhyate /
SA20mavt:306: na hyaviśodhitāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ mokṣo'sti saṅkliṣṭā ca mahatā yatnena
SA20mavt:308: atha vā lakṣaṇaṃ saṅkleśavyavadānābhidhānād anyan nāstītyataḥ
SA20mavt:322: atra ca śūnyatāprabhāvitatvāt mārganirodhayor api grahaṇamṃ veditavyaṃ
SA20mavt:323: saṅkleśapakṣād eva vyavadānapakṣo mārgayitavyo na punaḥ pṛthaktvam
SA20mavt:325: yadi dvayaṃ nāsti kathaṃ tasyāṃ vidyamānāyāṃ loko bhrānta ityāha -
SA20mavt:330: abhūtavacanena ca yathā'yaṃ parikalpyate grāhyagrāhakatvena tathā
SA20mavt:332: parikalpavacanena tvartho yathā parikalpyate tathārtho na vidhyate iti
SA20mavt:334: evam asya grāhyagrāhakavinirmuktaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ paridīpitaṃ bhavati /
SA20mavt:348: na tv abhūtaparikalpo'pyabhāvaḥ yathā śūnyā rajjuḥ sarpasvabhāvenātat
SA20mavt:349: svabhāvatvāt sarvakālaṃ śūnyā na tu rajju svabhāvena tathehāpi /
SA20mavt:350: tasyām api sa vidyata iti abhūtaparikalpaḥ /
SA20mavt:351: evaṃ hy āgantukāvaraṇopakliṣṭatvāt tad agrahaṇam uktam abdhātvādivad iti /
SA20mavt:352: evaṃ yad yatra nāsti tat tena śūnyam iti yathābhūtaṃ samanupaśyatīti /
SA20mavt:364: yac chūnyaṃ tasya sad bhāvāt yena śūnyaṃ tasya tatrābhāvāt /
SA20mavt:372: anyena hy anyasya śūunyatā dṛṣṭā yathā bhikṣubhir vihārasya /
SA20mavt:374: yathā rajjur māyā vā svātmany avidyamānena sarpākāreṇa puruṣādinā
SA20mavt:376: tatra kasyacid grāhanirvartanārthaṃ sarpapuruṣādibhiś ca śūnyety ucyate
SA20mavt:378: prakhyāyamāno bālānāṃ tad grāhābhiniveśaty ājanārthaṃ dvayena
SA20mavt:381: kim artham asau śloka ārabdha iti ?
SA20mavt:383: evaṃ ca hyekāntapratikṣepeṇa sarvam idaṃ na śūnyaṃ nāśūnyam iti
SA20mavt:392: sattvād abhūtaparikalpasya na saṃskṛtaṃ śūnyam abhūtaparikalpātmatvena
SA20mavt:395: śūnyātāyās tu sarvam abhūtaparikalpe tad dharmateti kṛtvā /
SA20mavt:397: evam asaṃskṛtam api dharmatārūpeṇa na śūnyaṃ /
SA20mavt:399: sā ca madhyamā pratipad iti ratnakūṭādimadhye'stīti kāśyapāyam
SA20mavt:402: yadetayor dvayor antayor madhyamiyam ucyate kāśyapa madhyamā pratipad
SA20mavt:403: dharmāṇāṃ bhūtapratyavekṣeti sā madhyamā pratipadevam anulomitā /
SA20mavt:405: naikāntena śūnyam ity abhūtaparikalpasya tac chūnyatāyāś ca [p.14]
SA20mavt:410: evam abhūtaparikalpasya sal lakṣaṇam asallakṣaṇañca khyāpayitveti /
SA20mavt:411: idaṃ sattvena lakṣyata iti sattvam eva sallakṣaṇaṃ /
SA20mavt:414: evam asattvena lakṣyata iti asatvam evāsal lakṣaṇāt /
SA20mavt:416: yasmād abhūtaparikalpe dvayaṃ nāsti tasmād abhūtaparikalpo'pi
SA20mavt:426: vijñānaṃ nāsti cā'syārthas tadabhāvāt tadapyasat // iti /
SA20mavt:434: atha vā 'bhūtaparikalpo'stītyanena tat sattvamātraṃ jñāyate na tu
SA20mavt:436: dvayābhāve'pi yad grāhyagrāhakābhiniveśakāraṇaṃ na vijñāyate dvayaṃ
SA20mavt:437: ca nāstīti yataḥ pratīyate tad api noktam ityatas tat pratipādanārtham
SA20mavt:445: nāsti cāsyārthas tadabhāvāt tad apyasat / iti /
SA20mavt:460: na hi puruṣe'sati sthāṇuḥ puruṣābhāso bhavatīti /
SA20mavt:462: arthādyābhāsaṃ hi vijñānaṃ bālā vijñānāt pṛthag
SA20mavt:465: vijñānam evedam arthādyābhāsam utpadyate taimirikāṇām iva
SA20mavt:467: evaṃ cāṣṭavijñānavastukaḥ paratantro'bhūtaparikalpa ity uktaṃ bhavati /
SA20mavt:473: tais teṣu vā sajjata iti sattvaḥ /
SA20mavt:475: ātmapratibhāsaṃ kliṣṭaṃ manaḥ ātmamohādisamprayogād iti kliṣṭasya
SA20mavt:488: na tv anyayor grāhakarūpeṇa prakhyānād anākāraḥ /
SA20mavt:494: tac ca tayor nāstīty upalabdhyabhāvād anākāraḥ /
SA20mavt:495: yadyubhayam apy anākāraṃ parasparabhinnasvarūpac ca rūpādivac
SA20mavt:497: rūpādibhyaścakṣurādibhyaś ca vijñānasya ko'sāvātmātiśayo yatas tān
SA20mavt:498: nirākritya tair abhinnarūpaṃ vijñānaṃ gṛhyate tad
SA20mavt:504: ubhayataḥ purusaiḥ saṃrakṣyamāṇāḥ paśyanti manuṣYādayaḥ punaḥ
SA20mavt:508: tathā pṛthivyādi kṛtsneṣu sarvaṃ pṛthivayādibhir vyāptaṃ paśyati /
SA20mavt:511: tasmāt tad arthamantareṇa sarvam arthasattvādinirbhāsaṃ vijñānam eva
SA20mavt:515: atha vā yathā vijñānenārthaḥ parikalpyate tathārthasyābhāvo
SA20mavt:517: tathā hi vijñaptir api vijñapty antaraparikalpitenātmanā śūnyeti
SA20mavt:522: tasmād arthābhāvād vijñātṛtvena vijñānam asad na [p.17]
SA20mavt:526: tad bhinnasvabhāve sati tad vijñānaṃ kathaṃ yujyeta kathaṃ parasparaṃ
SA20mavt:531: iti tat prasiddham iti pradarśayann āha -
SA20mavt:534: ata ity anantaroktād hetorarthābhāvāt tad apy asad iti punar apy
SA20mavt:542: na tathā'stitvān na ca sarvathā nāstitvāt tad
SA20mavt:544: tatra catuḥprakāre'py anākāratvād vitathākāratvāc ca yathāsambhavaṃ
SA20mavt:548: na ca sarvathā'bhāvo bhrāntimātrasyotpādād ityātmatvenābhāvo na tu
SA20mavt:549: yadākāreṇa pratibhāsate tena bhrāntir ucyare māyāvat /
SA20mavt:553: kimartha punas tasya bhrāntivijñānasyā'bhāva eva neṣyate
SA20mavt:555: na hi kenacit tasyāstitvaṃ kalpayituṃ śakyate
SA20mavt:560: kiṃ tarhi saṅkleśavyavadānapakṣasāmarthāt tad astitvam anumīyate / [p.18]
SA20mavt:561: anyatheti yadi tasya sarvathābhāva eveṣyate na bandho na mokṣa iti /
SA20mavt:563: pūrvaṃ baddho mucyata iti kṛtvā muktir api na syāt /
SA20mavt:564: atha vā kathaṃ na yathā prakhyāti tathā bhāveneṣyate sarvathā
SA20mavt:568: anyathā hi na bandho na mokṣa iti saṅkleśavyavadānāpavādadoṣaḥ syāt /
SA20mavt:569: yathā grāhyagrāhakatvena bhrāntir udbhāsitā'pi yadi tathā syāt
SA20mavt:570: paramārthata evaṃ sati nityaḥ saṅkleśaḥ syāt /
SA20mavt:572: evaṃ ca bhrāntimātrasyāpy abhāve saṅkleśābhāvo nityañca vyavadānaṃ
SA20mavt:574: evaṃ cobhayathāpi mokṣārthināṃ vyartho yatnaḥ syāt /
SA20mavt:577: atha vā yena saṅgraho lakṣyate tat saṅgrahalakṣaṇaṃ /
SA20mavt:581: ataḥ sūtrāntarair avirodhapradarśanārthaṃ teṣām iha saṅgraha ucyate /
SA20mavt:584: kalpitaḥ paratantraś ca pariniṣpanna eva ca /
SA20mavt:585: arthād abhūtakalpāc ca dvayābhāvāc ca deśitaḥ // iti /
SA20mavt:586: grāhyaṃ grāhakaṃ ca svabhāvaśūnyatvād abhūtam apy astitvena
SA20mavt:589: sa punar dravyato'sannapi vyavahārato'stīti svabhāva ucyate /
SA20mavt:601: arthaḥ parikalpitaḥ svabhāva ityartho'tra rūpādayaścakṣurādaya ātmā
SA20mavt:603: sa ca kalpitena svabhāvenābhūtaparikalpe nāstīty asan parikalpitaḥ
SA20mavt:609: parair hetupratyayais tantryate janyate na tu svayambhavatīti paratantraḥ /
SA20mavt:613: atra hy abhūtaparikalpasya dvayarahitatā grāhyagrāhakābhāva uktaḥ /
SA20mavt:616: sa eva grāhyagrāhakarūpeṇa svātmany avidyamānena prakhyānāt
SA20mavt:621: parijñāya sākṣāt kartavyañca vastu sandarśitaṃ bhavati //1-6// [p.20]
SA20mavt:636: rūpādyābhāsaṃ vijñānaṃ pravartate na tu rūpādiko'rtho'stītyevaṃ
SA20mavt:642: na ca viṣayapratibhāsātmanotpattim uktvā vijñānasyānyā kriyā'sti
SA20mavt:643: yāṃ kriyāṃ kurvat vijñānaṃ viṣayam ālambana ity ucyate /
SA20mavt:644: yadi vālambanasya vartamāna eva vijñāne vyāpāro notpadyamāne evam
SA20mavt:650: ātmātiśayasyānyata eva darśanād anyadevotpannam ālambanaṃ gṛhṇātīti
SA20mavt:654: sa ca svākārapratibhāsa jñānakāraṇatvena śeṣebhyaḥ pratyayebhyo
SA20mavt:659: sarvam eva hi vijñānaṃ ghaṭapaṭādipratibhāsam utpadyate na tu
SA20mavt:663: yo'pi manyate samuditāḥ paramāṇava ālambanaṃ na pratyekaṃ tasyāpy ayam
SA20mavt:665: samuditā api hi te pratyekam evālambanatveneṣYante na tat samudāyena /
SA20mavt:666: tatra paramāṇūnāṃ pratyekapratibhāsaṃ jñānaṃ notpadyate nāpi tat
SA20mavt:672: atha ca niruddha ālambanaṃ evaṃ satyātītānāgataṃ viṣayaḥ syāt /
SA20mavt:673: svapnādau tu vijñānam anālambanam iti siddhaṃ /
SA20mavt:676: na hi svapnādāvasatyarthe tannimittaṃ yujyate mukhādyabhāve tat
SA20mavt:678: utpadyamānam utpannaṃ vālambanaṃ vijñānanimittam abhāvān nirodhāc
SA20mavt:683: anākāre hi tasmin grāhyagrāhakaniyama eva na syāt /
SA20mavt:684: anyastvapratighaṃ rūpameva svapne yogināṃ cāśubhādāvālambanaṃ manyate
SA20mavt:687: na cāvijñaptimātrād anyad apratighaṃ rūpaṃ śāstre varṇyate /
SA20mavt:689: aparastv anubhūtārtham eva svapne vijñānaviṣayatvenecchati jātyandhena
SA20mavt:691: na jātyandhaḥ svapne rūpaṃ na gṛhṇāti /
SA20mavt:692: avyutpannasaṅketatvāt tu nāmato na jānāty ato nānyasyācaṣṭe /
SA20mavt:693: yadi cānubhūtasyaiva svapne darśanam evaṃ jātyandhasyāpi rūpadarśanaṃ
SA20mavt:698: na hy atītānāgatavartamānānubhave suptasya jāgrataś ca kaścid
SA20mavt:700: tasmāt parikalpamātram evaitad anubhūtārthaviṣayaṃ svapne vijñānam iti
SA20mavt:701: / atītasya cābhāvān nirviṣayaṃ vijñānam eva svapne'rthābhāsam
SA20mavt:706: yatha na vijṇyanād bahiḥ parikalpitaṃ grāhyamastīti
SA20mavt:713: kim arthaṃ punaḥ prathamata eva vijñaptimātrasyaivābhāvaṃ na
SA20mavt:721: tathā hi vijñaptimātram idaṃ niśritya rūpānupalambhānukūlo
SA20mavt:731: tatraiva ca sarvatragadharmadhātvadhigamāt prathamāṃ bhūmiṃ praviśatīti
SA20mavt:738: atha vā yat pūrvaṃ pratijñātam abhūtaparikalpe dvayaṃ nāstīti tad
SA20mavt:739: anenākāreṇa pratyātmavedyatvāt siddham iti pradarśayann āha -
SA20mavt:744: etat tritayam apy abhāvān na yujyate /
SA20mavt:749: yasmād upalabdhir anupalabdhisvabhāvā tasmāt samatā tulyatā jñeyā /
SA20mavt:753: na tu tayā kiñcid upalabhyte'rthābhāvād iti /
SA20mavt:756: yaś ca bālānām asatyārthe'rthopalambho yaścāryāṇām arthānupalambhas
SA20mavt:757: tayor dvayos tulyalakṣaṇatvāt samatā jñeyā sarpabhrānty anupalabdhivat
SA20mavt:758: ata eva bravīti - abhūtārthapratibhāsatayā tūpalabdhir ity
SA20mavt:761: yaś ca bālānāṃ grāhakopalambho yaścāryāṇām arthābhāvād
SA20mavt:766: tasmāc ca samtā jñeyā nopalambhopalambhayoḥ / iti /
SA20mavt:771: kiṃ tarhi samam etad ubhayaṃ nirvikalpatayā /
SA20mavt:775: nāpaneyam ataḥ kiñcit prakṣeptavyaṃ na kiñcana /
SA20mavt:777: yadyevaṃ kathaṃ vijñaptir upalabdhir ity ucyate /
SA20mavt:778: abhūtārthapratibhāsatayā loke śāstre ca tathā pratītatvād
SA20mavt:794: yathā rūpaṃ bhūtāni bhautikañca, evamabhūtaparikalpo'pi cittaṃ
SA20mavt:816: teṣu sarveṣu vyākhyāneṣu katame ta ityavaśyaṃ pūrvavyākhyānoktā eva
SA20mavt:839: cittaviśeṣā eva caitasā ihābhipretā iti kecijjānanti /
SA20mavt:843: naikaṃ hi lakṣaṇaṃ loke vicitram iṣyate /
SA20mavt:844: mā bhūd ekam anekasvabhāvam iti syād eṣa [p.26]
SA20mavt:850: yā vedanā yā saṃjñā yac cittaṃ yad vijñānañca saṃsṛṣṭvā amī
SA20mavt:852: saṃsargaś ca nāma satāṃ yugapac ca bhavatīti /

SA20mavt:871: tat punaḥ saptavidhaṃ pravṛttivijñānam upabhogaprayojakatvād aupabhogikaṃ
SA20mavt:873: tatra vijñāne ye caitasās te'pi tat phalam iti sambandhaḥ /
SA20mavt:875: ālayavijñānam anyeṣāṃ vijñānānāṃ pratyayatvāt pratyayavijñānam iti /
SA20mavt:876: ālīyante sarve sāsravā dharmās tatra phalabhāvena tac ca teṣu
SA20mavt:880: sarveṣāṃ sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bījam anubadhnāti anyeṣāñca
SA20mavt:883: tasmād ālayavijñānāt pratyetīti tat pratyayam utpadyata ityarthaḥ /
SA20mavt:885: pravṛttivijñānaṃ hy ālayavijñānāt pravartamānam anutpannasya taj
SA20mavt:888: tasmāt paripuṣṭabījāt pariṇāmaviśeṣaprāptāt punas taj jātīyaṃ
SA20mavt:889: pravṛttivijñānam utpadyata ityevaṃ tat pratyayaṃ pravṛttivijñānaṃ
SA20mavt:896: sarvadharmā hi ālīnā vijñāne teṣu tat tathā /
SA20mavt:911: triprakārāpy upabhukṣyata ity upabhogaḥ anubhūyata ity arthaḥ /
SA20mavt:913: tasmā bālās tat saṃvedanārthaṃ viṣayam abhiniviśante /
SA20mavt:914: na kevalaṃ vedanā arthopalabdhir apy upabhoga ityanye /
SA20mavt:915: tac ca na upabhogo vedaneti bhāṣyavirodhāt /
SA20mavt:916: arthopalabdhiś ca na vijñānād anyeti na tasyāścaitasatvaṃ prayujyate /
SA20mavt:918: upabhoge saṃjñāyāñ ca prerakāḥ saṃskārā vijñānasya
SA20mavt:924: viṣayacihnaṃ vyavahāranimittaṃ paricchinnaṃ karotīti paricchedaḥ saṃjñā
SA20mavt:928: uktaṃ yato yādṛśo yad arthā ca pravṛttir iti //1-10//
SA20mavt:940: duḥKhanā jantyā jarāmaraṇena ca parikliśyate jagat /
SA20mavt:942: pravartamānā jagataḥ parikleśāya bhavanti tat saṅkleśalakṣaṇaṃ /
SA20mavt:950: kena chādanāt kathaṃ vā chādanāt kliśyata iti ?
SA20mavt:956: bhūtadarśanaṃ punaḥ prādhānyena lokottaraprajñā tat pṛṣṭhodbhavatvāt
SA20mavt:957: tat pṛṣṭhalābhāt tad avagamāc ca tat prayoga iti
SA20mavt:959: bhūtadarśanavibandhād avidyā saṃskārāṇāṃ pratyaya ityevaṃ chādanād
SA20mavt:962: kena ropaṇāt kva kasya vetyata āha saṃskārair vijñāne karmavāsanāyā iti /
SA20mavt:963: tatra saṃskārā yat kāyikaṃ karma vācikaṃ mānasaṃ ca
SA20mavt:964: puṇyāpuṇyāniñjyasvarūpaṃ tat punar bhavam abhisaṃskarotīti saṃskāraḥ /
SA20mavt:966: tadeva ca saṃskāraśabdenocyate na tu sarvaṃ /
SA20mavt:967: taccābidyādhipatyāt punar bhavam ākṣeptuṃ samarthaṃ bhavati na
SA20mavt:969: tathāhi tāny anutpannavidyasya punarbhavaṃ saṃskurvanti notpannavidyasya /
SA20mavt:970: na cādhipatyamātreṇaivāvidyā saṃskārāṇāṃ pratyaya ucyate sāmānyena
SA20mavt:977: sahabhūtā'vidyā sāmānyapratyaya iti saṃskārāṇāṃ pratyaya uktaḥ /
SA20mavt:978: vijñāna iti atrālayavijñānam abhipretaṃ na tu pravṛttivijñānaṃ /
SA20mavt:988: pratiṣṭhāpanaṃ punaratra vijñānasantāne tat prathamatas tad bījasyāpy
SA20mavt:990: nahi kasyacit sāsravasya dharmasyānāsravasyevāpūrvaṃ bījam ādhīyate
SA20mavt:991: evaṃ saṃskārair vijñāne punarbhāvabījādhānāj jagat kliśyate /
SA20mavt:993: kena nayanāt kva kasya veti na vijñāyata ityāha vijñānenotpatti
SA20mavt:996: upapattisthāne punar bhavabījabhūtāyā vāsanāyāḥ prāpaṇaṃ nayanaṃ /
SA20mavt:997: tathā ca sati na pratisandhivijñānaṃ saṃskārapratyayaṃ
SA20mavt:1001: ārūpyasamāpatīlābhino hi yatraiva cyavante tatraivotpadyanta iti katham
SA20mavt:1010: tad bhāvitaviśeṣeṇa hy anatareṣu nikāyasabhāgeṣu tad viśiṣṭatvaṃ sidhyati
SA20mavt:1013: atha vā''maraṇāt sarvam evātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti tat prathamataḥ
SA20mavt:1015: atha vā'bhinne'pi nāmarūpeṇāti tat prathamataḥ sarvasya hetubhāvena
SA20mavt:1017: atha vā'bhinne'pi nāmarūpeṇātmabhāvo yathā parigṛhyeta tat pṛthaktvena
SA20mavt:1018: darśayati yathā sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ pañcabhiḥ skandhaiḥ saṅgṛhītam iti /
SA20mavt:1025: nāmarūpāvasthāyāṃ hi śarīram aparipūrṇam ucyate cakṣurādy
SA20mavt:1027: asti ca tasyām avasthāyāṃ kāyāyatanaṃ manāayatanañca tad apy
SA20mavt:1031: kāyāyatanaṃ ca paripūrṇaṃ bhavati taccakṣūr ādyāśritānāṃ
SA20mavt:1038: āśrayaparipūraṇāt ṣaḍāyatanena kliśyate jagad iti veditavyaṃ /
SA20mavt:1041: sukhādivedanotpattyanukūlo yastriprakāro vikāras tat paricchedaḥ sparśaḥ
SA20mavt:1042: ata evāyam indriyavikārasādṛśyaṃ spṛśati tadākāratayeti sparśa ucyate / [p.31]
SA20mavt:1043: atha vā ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśa indriyasya sukhādivedanānukūlaṃ
SA20mavt:1046: vedanā hi tṛṣṇayopabhujyate āsvādyata ity arthaḥ /
SA20mavt:1052: karṣaṇāt kena kasya veti na vijñāyata ity ata āha tṛṣṇayā
SA20mavt:1056: yadārdrīkṛtaḥ puar bhava utpattāv upayuṅkte utpattiṃ cāvasthāpayati
SA20mavt:1059: kena nibandhanāt kva kasya veti praśnāvakāśe svayam evāha upādānair
SA20mavt:1063: ca vijñānaṃ hi cchandarāgavaśāt tatra vartate /
SA20mavt:1064: ābhimukhyādity atrāpi parapraśnāvakāśe svayamevaha bhavena kṛtasya
SA20mavt:1067: vāsanāvasthaṃ vipākaphalaṃ prati vṛttilambhanād bhavaḥ sadbhūta
SA20mavt:1073: evaṃ bhavāt punarbhavābhinirvṛttau satyāmādita eva garbhādhāne
SA20mavt:1076: tathā ca mātubhojanacaryayoḥ saṅkaṭaghunoraparityāgād api kliśyate /
SA20mavt:1078: kliśyate jagaj jātaṃ punar jarayā khālityapālityādilakṣaṇayā maraṇena
SA20mavt:1086: kliśyata iti na vyavadāyata ity apare /
SA20mavt:1098: upanayahetuḥ parigrahahetuḥ upabhogahetuḥ ākarṣaṇahetuḥ udvegahetuś ca ...
SA20mavt:1107: katividhaḥ punar anena dvādaśāṅgena na pratītyasamutpādena samāsataḥ
SA20mavt:1108: saṃkleśaḥ pradarśita ityata evedam ucyate so'yaṃ dvādaśāṅgaḥ
SA20mavt:1110: tredhā dvedhā ca saṃkleśaḥ saptadhā iti /
SA20mavt:1114: kleśo hi pravartamānaḥ svaparātmanor vyābādhakatvāt saṃkleśaḥ /
SA20mavt:1115: yathoktaṃ sūtre'pi - rakto rāgaparīta ātmavyābādhāyāpi cetayate
SA20mavt:1120: tathā hi kleśādhipatyena karma janmākṣipati dṛṣṭasatyasya satyapi karmaṇi
SA20mavt:1125: karma ca śubhāśubhaṃ tadātve kāyacittayor āyāsanimittatvād
SA20mavt:1134: svarūpāvasthaṃ karma saṃskārāḥ bījāvasthaṃ bhava iti /
SA20mavt:1144: punaḥ sa eva pratītyasamutpādaḥ saptadhā saṃkleśa iti
SA20mavt:1148: avidyāgato hi tattvasammohād anityādīn nityādirūpeṇa viparyasyatīti /
SA20mavt:1154: pūrvaṃ nāmarūpeṇaiva parigraha ukto jarāyujādikāṃ yonim abhipretya
SA20mavt:1155: idānīm upapādukam adhikṛtya ṣaḍāyatanenā'pi parigraha uktaḥ /
SA20mavt:1156: atha vā nāmarūpeṇa tat prathamata ātmabhāvamātrasya saṅgraho
SA20mavt:1158: iha tv aparipūrṇasya paripūrṇasya ceti nāsti virodhaḥ /
SA20mavt:1162: sa upabhuktakarmavipāko bālas tasyāṃ tasyāṃ vedanāyāṃ tṛṣyati /
SA20mavt:1163: vivṛddhatṛṣṇaś ca tat saṃyogatṛṣṇayā kāmādīn upādatte /
SA20mavt:1164: tad upādānāc cāsya pūrvabhūtaṃ paunarbhavikaṃ karma vāsanāvasthaṃ
SA20mavt:1165: pariṇataṃ yathākṣiptavipākadānayā pravṛttiṃ labdhvā bhavo bhavati /
SA20mavt:1166: sa ca tṛṣṇopādānabhavaḥ saṃskārākṣiptaḥ punar bhavābhinirvṛttaya
SA20mavt:1176: karmatvasādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ aṅkurasyeva bījaṃ tad bhedena janambhedād iti
SA20mavt:1177: atha vā nātra pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāntāni trīṇi kāṇḍāni kiṃ tarhi
SA20mavt:1184: tasmānnātra hetuḥ phalaṃ vā sarvatra pañcaskandhikāvastheti
SA20mavt:1191: yathābhinirvṛttir yā cābhinirvṛttiḥ tasyāñca ya ādīnava iti /
SA20mavt:1193: avidyāpratyayaiḥ saṃskāraiḥ yathā tattvaṃ mugdhvā viparītaṃ saṃjānāti
SA20mavt:1198: paunarbhavikaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā ca yathāyogaṃ /
SA20mavt:1203: tasya vijñāne vāsanāvasthasya karmaṇas tena bhavīkaraṇāt /
SA20mavt:1206: upādānaviśeṣaparigraheṇa yenātra punar bhavatvaṃ vartate so'tra bhava
SA20mavt:1212: atra tūpanayahetur nirarthaṃ iti cet na nirarthakaḥ /
SA20mavt:1214: sarve caite saṅkleśā abhūtaparikalpāt pravartanta iti
SA20mavt:1220: piṇḍārthaḥ punar abhūtaparikalpasya navavidhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ paridīpitaṃ
SA20mavt:1236: kalpitaḥ paratantraś ca pariniṣpanna eva ca / iti /
SA20mavt:1243: tarthārthadṛṣṭir vijñānaṃ tad viśeṣe tu caitasāḥ / iti /
SA20mavt:1249: evam abhūtaparikalpaṃ navaprakāraṃ khyāpayitvā yathā śūnyatā
SA20mavt:1251: dvayam anena pratijñātam abhūtaparikalpaḥ śūnyatā ca / [p.36]
SA20mavt:1266: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ yadebhiḥ prakāraiḥ śūnyatā vijñātavyā ?
SA20mavt:1271: saṃkleśe nirākṛte sā viśuddheti tat saṃkleśaprahāṇāya
SA20mavt:1273: bheda sādhanāvabodhād vikārābhāve saty api bhedaṃ sukhaṃ pratipadyata
SA20mavt:1275: pṛthaktve sati dharmād anyā dharmateti na yujyate anityatāduḥkhatāvat /
SA20mavt:1276: ekatve sati viśuddhyālambanaṃ jñānaṃ na syāt sāmānyalakṣaṇañca /
SA20mavt:1278: kathaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vijñeyam iti lakṣaṇaṃ hi prāg uddiṣṭam ityatas tadeva
SA20mavt:1280: dvayā'bhāvo hy abhāvasya bhāvaḥ śūnyasya lakṣaṇaṃ / [p.37]
SA20mavt:1284: tasya ca dvayābhāvasya yo bhāva etac chūnyatāyā lakṣaṇaṃ /
SA20mavt:1291: ity abhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇatvaṃ śūnyatāyāḥ paridīpitaṃ bhavati na
SA20mavt:1296: svātantryam evātra gamyate śaśaviṣāṇābhāvavat na duḥkhatādivad
SA20mavt:1301: atha vā dvayābhāvaḥ śūnyatety abhāvaśabdasya sāmānyavācitān na
SA20mavt:1304: na hi prāg abhāvapradhvaṃsābhāvau svopadānād anyatrākhyātuṃ yujyete
SA20mavt:1308: yady abhāvātmikā śūnyatā kathaṃ paramārtha ucyate ?
SA20mavt:1320: so'bhāvaśced dvayasyāstitvaṃ syān na ca syād abhūtaparikalpasya
SA20mavt:1323: nityasukhabhāvābhāvasvarūpatvān na bhāvo nāpy abhāva ity ucyate /
SA20mavt:1324: yadi punar abhūtaparikalpasya śūnyatā dharmatāsti kim asau tasmād anyo
SA20mavt:1331: pṛthaktve sati dharmād anyā dharmateti na yujyate /
SA20mavt:1333: dharmād vibhinnalakṣaṇatvād dharmatā dharmāntaram eva bhavati tad
SA20mavt:1335: na ca dharmāntaraṃ dharmāntarasya dharmatā bhavitum arhati tatra punar
SA20mavt:1338: yathā'nityatā'nityebhyo nānyā duḥkhatā ca duḥkhād eva śūnyatā'pi na
SA20mavt:1340: ekatve sati viśuddhyālambanaṃ na syāt sāmānyalakṣaṇañceti /
SA20mavt:1345: tasyāpi dharmasvarūpavat parasparato bheda iti sāmānyatā hīyate /
SA20mavt:1346: atha vā svalakṣaṇasya tasmād anyatvād bhāvasvarūpavad bhedābhāvaḥ /
SA20mavt:1349: atha vā viśuddhyartham ālambanaṃ viśuddhyālambanaṃ na bhāvasvalakṣaṇam
SA20mavt:1352: yo hi bhāvasya satastattvānyatvena vyākaroti tena nirgranthavād
SA20mavt:1354: śūnyatā tu na bhāva iti nāstyayaṃ doṣaḥ /
SA20mavt:1360: dharmadhātuś ca paryāyāḥ śūnyatāyāḥ samāsataḥ // iti /
SA20mavt:1364: etac ca paryāyapañcakaṃ yathāpradhānaṃ gāthāyām uktam evam anye'pi
SA20mavt:1366: tad yathā - advayatā avikalpadhātuḥ dharmatā anabhilapyatā anirodhaḥ
SA20mavt:1369: naite śabdā gauṇāḥ kiṃ tarhi anvarthā iti -
SA20mavt:1373: tadeva pradarśanārtham āha nityaṃ tathaiveti kṛtvā /
SA20mavt:1377: koṭiḥ paryanto yataḥ pareṇānyajjñeyaṃ nāstītyato bhūtakoṭir
SA20mavt:1389: sarvair eva saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtanimittaiḥ śūnyatā śūnyety animittam ucyate /
SA20mavt:1392: āryajñānagocaratvāt paramārtha iti paramaṃ hi lokottarajñānaṃ /
SA20mavt:1394: etad eva pradarśayann āha - paramajñānagocaratvād iti /
SA20mavt:1399: tadeva vibhāvayann āha - āryadharmāṇāṃ tad ālambanaprabhatvād iti /
SA20mavt:1400: svalakṣaṇopādāyarūpadhāraṇe'py ayaṃ dhātuśabdo vartata ity āha
SA20mavt:1404: sūtrāntareṣv anye paryāyā uktā apyanenaiva nyāyena svārthe
SA20mavt:1407: athavā paryāyārthānantaraṃ bhedo vijñeya ity uktam atas
SA20mavt:1408: tannirdeśānantaraṃ pṛcchati - kathaṃ śūnyatāyāḥ prabhedo vijñeya iti /
SA20mavt:1409: abhūtaparikalpo hi saṃkleśaḥ tasya prahāṇaṃ viśuddhir ucyate /
SA20mavt:1410: saṅkleśaviśuddhikāle ca śūnyatāvyatiriktam anyan nāsti yat saṅkliśyate
SA20mavt:1412: tasmāt saṃkleśaviśuddhikālayoḥ śūnyataiva saṅkliśyate viśuddhyate ceti
SA20mavt:1416: kadā saṅkliṣṭā kadā nirmaletyanavabodhāt pṛcchati - kasyām
SA20mavt:1426: yeṣām āryāṇāṃ tattvajñānād aviparītacetasāṃ śūnyatā nirantaram
SA20mavt:1427: ākāśavad virajaskā prakhyāti tān prati prahīṇamaletyucyate /
SA20mavt:1428: evaṃ śūnyatāyā āpekṣikā saṃkleśaviśuddhir draṣṭavyā na
SA20mavt:1431: na hy avasthābhedo vikāram antareṇa dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA20mavt:1433: ata āha - kathaṃ vikāradharmiṇītvādanityā na bhavatīti /
SA20mavt:1434: na hi saṅkliṣṭāvasthātaḥ śūnyatāviśuddhā'vasthāyām anyo vikāraḥ /
SA20mavt:1443: evaṃ śūnyatāpy āgantukamalaiḥ saṅkliśyate, avikṛtasvarūpāpi tad
SA20mavt:1445: yo hi tameva bhāvaṃ pūrvaṃ saṅkleśalakṣaṇaṃ paścād viśuddhisvabhāvaṃ
SA20mavt:1447: vikārasvabhāvatvāt na tu yatrāpy āgantukaṃ tad ubhayaṃ /
SA20mavt:1449: prabhedanirdeśādhikāre sarve śūnyatāprabhedā vaktavyā ityata āha
SA20mavt:1459: nānyathā tan nānātvaṃ śakyate darśayitum ityato vastunānātvena tan
SA20mavt:1461: pūrvaṃ tāvad bhoktā vibhāvayitavyaḥ tat snehābhiniveśatyājanārthaṃ /
SA20mavt:1465: tad anantaraṃ tad adhiṣṭhānasya śarīrasya pratiṣṭhābhājanaloko
SA20mavt:1468: etac catur vidhaṃ vastu tac chūnyatā vastuśūnyatety ucyate /
SA20mavt:1470: tāni ca cakṣūrādīni yāvan manaḥ paryantāni /
SA20mavt:1475: tāni viṣayābhāvena bhujyanta iti bhojanam ato bāhyāyatanaśūnyatā
SA20mavt:1481: ata evāha - tasya vistīrṇatvāt tacchūnyatā mahāśūnyatocyate iti /
SA20mavt:1486: dṛṣṭaṃ tatra yo grāhyagrāhakābhiniśeśo'yam eva cātra paramārthākāro
SA20mavt:1487: yathā tac chrutājñānena dṛṣṭam iti vikalpaḥ /

SA20mavt:2152: alpaśruto he na śaknoti dharmān pravivektum /
SA20mavt:2163: yatrā'rthe daśa kāraṇāni bhavantīti - utpattyādau prāptiparyante
SA20mavt:2170: ucyate tadyathā kuḍyādikam ālokamāvṛnvat kāryasya cakṣur
SA20mavt:2172: evaṃ kṛtvaiṣāṃ daśānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ triṃśad āvaraṇaviparyayeṇa triṃśat
SA20mavt:2174: tatra śubhotpattikāraṇaṃ trīṇi - prayoga āyatanaprayogo yoniśaḥ prayogaś
SA20mavt:2176: tad yathā cakṣur ādaya ityatraiva dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA20mavt:2180: evam utpattyāvaraṇaṃ śubhe draṣṭavyam ityāha tasyotpādanīyatvād iti
SA20mavt:2181: śubhe sthityādyasambhavād utpattyāvaraṇam evaitad iti darśayati /
SA20mavt:2185: yāval lokas tāvad avasthānād akopyatvaṃ, nā'nyathā bhavati vinivartate
SA20mavt:2187: śrāvakādīnān tu bodhiḥ svasantāna eva kṛtārthatvād vyāvartate /
SA20mavt:2189: āśrayaparāvṛttilakṣaṇatvād bodher yāvat sattvās tāvad avatiṣṭhantīty
SA20mavt:2191: utpattiṃ vinā bhāvitatvāt tu sthiter utpattir apyatra bhavati /
SA20mavt:2193: na cā'nyat tad vyatirekeṇa sthitikāraṇam astītyata etad evoktaṃ /
SA20mavt:2198: sthitikāraṇāni punar bodheḥ kuśalotpādo manasikāraḥ paripūrṇasambhāraś
SA20mavt:2200: atra ca śubhānutpattyādayaḥ kuśalotpatyādivibandhe vartamānā bodheḥ
SA20mavt:2202: tadyathā catvāra āhārāḥ sattvānām ityatraiva nidarśanaṃ /
SA20mavt:2203: na hi kavaḍākārādibhir āhārair apūrvāḥ sattvā utpadyante
SA20mavt:2207: atraiva nidarśanaṃ yadyasyādhārabhūtan tatra tasya dhṛtiḥ
SA20mavt:2210: tat kāraṇaṃ gotraṃ kalyāṇamitrasampannatā cittā'parikhedatā ca /
SA20mavt:2218: ata evāha - abhivyaktyāvaraṇaṃ dhīmattve tasya prakāśanīyatvād iti /
SA20mavt:2234: tasya trīṇi kāraṇāni - sahajadauṣṭhulyopaghāto vīryam apramādaś ca /
SA20mavt:2247: tac ca pudgalasambhāvanā dharmā'dhimuktir ābhiprāyikārthā'dhigamaś ca
SA20mavt:2248: ebhir dharmaiḥ sampratyayo bhavatītyataś ca sampratyayakāraṇavibandhena
SA20mavt:2250: atraiva kāraṇam āha - asampratyayena trasanād iti /
SA20mavt:2253: tat punaḥ saddharme gauravaṃ lābhasatkārapūjādinirapekṣatāa sattveṣu ca
SA20mavt:2259: dharmamātsaryeṇa ca pareṣāṃ dharmaṃ na deśayati /
SA20mavt:2263: tadviruddhatvāc cu tavyasanādikaṃ vaśitva āvaraṇaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
SA20mavt:2264: atraiva kāraṇam āha - tasya vaśitvasya vibhutvaprāptilakṣaṇatvād iti /
SA20mavt:2265: kecit tu śubhādīnām evam anukrame kāraṇam āhuḥ /
SA20mavt:2269: bodhicittañcāgamyaitad ubhayasampādane samartho bhavati ā bodher
SA20mavt:2276: evañca prayujyamāno viparyāsaṃ prajahāti aviparyastaṃ ca jñānam
SA20mavt:2278: ato dhīmatvānantaram abhrāntir uktā sa punar darśanamārgaḥ /
SA20mavt:2279: tad abhyasanenāvaraṇaṃ vijahātītyatas tad anantaram āvaraṇaprahāṇam
SA20mavt:2281: nirāvaraṇasya bhavabhogasaktyabhavād buddhatva eva mānasaṃ pariṇāmayati
SA20mavt:2284: evam bhūtasya ca sugambhīreṣv api buddhadharmeṣu prāmodyotpatīratrāsa
SA20mavt:2286: evaṃ dharmapratyakṣeṇa yena yenopāyena sattvavinayaṃ paśyati
SA20mavt:2287: tantamevopāyambhajata iti tasya kuto mātsaryambhaved ityatrāsānantaram
SA20mavt:2290: pravartata ityatas tad anantaraṃ vaśitvam uktaṃ /
SA20mavt:2292: asmin paricchede āvaraṇaprasaṅga ityataḥ śubhādīnām utpatīkāraṇāny
SA20mavt:2311: pūrvañca śubhādihetvāvaraṇadvāreṇa phalāvaraṇam uktaṃ iha tu sākṣāt
SA20mavt:2313: atha vā'prayogādibhyo vastvakauśalādikam anyadeveti tad anyad ucyate /
SA20mavt:2315: aprayogādikam āvaraṇam uktaṃ iha tu śubhasyaiva
SA20mavt:2319: mārgaparyantā bodhipakṣā ity ucyate daśa pāramitā daśa ca bhūmayo
SA20mavt:2324: teṣām punar vastu kāyavedanācittadharmāḥ tad viṣayatvāt /
SA20mavt:2336: śucisukhanityātmākāreṇa vā vikalpo vastv akauśalam yasmād ajñānaṃ
SA20mavt:2339: evāvaraṇam ucyate na tu vastvasmaraṇam apīti ?
SA20mavt:2341: tathā hi darśanātmakatvāt prajñāyāḥ prajñāpṛṣṭhalabdha ālambane
SA20mavt:2342: smṛtyādayaḥ pravartante na tu svātantryeṇa prajñāvat /
SA20mavt:2350: tat punar bhedābhāve'pi phalabhedāc caturdhā vyavasthāpyata iti smṛtiḥ
SA20mavt:2351: ataḥ samyak prahāṇānāṃ vīryātmakatvād ālasyam āvaraṇam uktaṃ /
SA20mavt:2356: gamanaṃ vā ṛddhiḥ ākāśagamanādikā samṛddhir ityarthaḥ /
SA20mavt:2360: na tu vīryādayas tatra na santi chandasahāyatvād apradhānās tu te
SA20mavt:2364: na taj jñāyate ata āha - aparipūryā ca cchandavīryacittamīmāṃsānām
SA20mavt:2367: anyatamavaikalyāt tadādhipatyasya samādher abhāvād bhāvanā hīyata
SA20mavt:2370: eṣāṃ hi prahāṇasaṃskārāṇāṃ bhāvanayā samādhau vaśitvam avāpyate
SA20mavt:2371: nānyathetyata eṣāṃ vaikalyād bhāvanāhīnateti na samādhau vaśitvam
SA20mavt:2378: kuśalamūlam abhisaṃskaroti tena mokṣalābhaniścayāt mokṣabhāgīyam ucyate
SA20mavt:2386: katham punar indriyāṇān daurbalyam ityata āha - vipakṣavyavakiraṇād iti
SA20mavt:2390: etac ca dvividham api nirvedhabhāgīyān durbalam
SA20mavt:2395: tasmād yat teṣām eva śraddhādīnām uṣmagatamūrdhānāvasthāyāṃ
SA20mavt:2407: yadi tu bodheranukūlatvād aṅgāni syur evaṃ smṛtyupasthānādīnām api
SA20mavt:2409: katham idaṃ bodhyaṅgeṣu dṛṣṭidoṣa āvaraṇam ityata āha - teṣān
SA20mavt:2413: parikalpitāḥ pañca dṛṣṭayo vicikitsā'vidayā tadālambanāṣca rāgādayaḥ
SA20mavt:2417: iha tu pradhānavivakṣayā dṛṣṭidoṣopadeśa iti na teṣām anupadeśo
SA20mavt:2430: saṅkṣepatas tu darśanaprahātavyād anyā sāsravā tacchaktir
SA20mavt:2436: tad anantaramparāramitāsu vaktavyam ityata āha - pāramitāsvāvaraṇaṃ
SA20mavt:2439: atra daśānāṃ pāramitānāṃ yasyāḥ pāramitāyā yat phalaṃ tadāvaraṇena
SA20mavt:2441: kimatra kāraṇaṃ yan mātsaryādayo vastuto dānādivibandhe vartamānas tat
SA20mavt:2444: tasmān mātsaryādiprahāṇa ādarotpādanārthaṃ phalāvaraṇam uktaṃ na
SA20mavt:2467: śobhanā gatiḥ sugatiḥ manuṣyo devaś ca /
SA20mavt:2472: etac ca kṣānti phalaṃ tadāvaraṇaṃ krodhaḥ /
SA20mavt:2488: taccā'nuśāsanyā bhavati anuśāsanī ca prajñā nā'nyathetyataḥ
SA20mavt:2492: dānaśīlādīnām akṣayatve yadāvaraṇam tad upāyapāramitāyā āvaraṇaṃ
SA20mavt:2493: tat punar dānādyakṣayatvaṃ kathambhavatītyata āha - bodhipariṇāmanayā
SA20mavt:2495: mahābodhipariṇataṃ dānādi kuśalamūlaṃ na kṣīyate buddhatvam iva /
SA20mavt:2501: katham ityata āha - praṇidhānavaśena tad anukūlopapattiparigrahād iti /
SA20mavt:2522: atra ca dravyataḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ nāmato daśa /
SA20mavt:2528: jñānapāramitā prakṛṣṭā satī kathaṃ na nirvikalpa iti ?
SA20mavt:2530: taj jñānāvabuddhatvaṃ paricchidya svayaṃ ca dharmasambhogaṃ
SA20mavt:2532: tac caitan nirvikalpe dvayam api nāstītyato na nirvikalpā
SA20mavt:2536: tad anantaraṃ bhūmiṣu vaktavyam ityata āha - bhūmau punar yathākramaṃ
SA20mavt:2545: dharmadhātoḥ sarvatragādyarthe yena yena vihāreṇa bodhisattvo bahulaṃ
SA20mavt:2546: viharati tasmin tasmin vihāre'vasthānārthena bhūmyākhyet pare /
SA20mavt:2549: abhisamita dharmo vimalāyāṃ svarasavāhinam adhiśīlaṃ śikṣāviśeṣaṃ
SA20mavt:2555: tāsām eva śikṣāṇāṃ śeṣāsu bhūmiṣu caturvidhaṃ phalaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20mavt:2565: tatra yad akliṣṭam ajñānaṃ tad daśasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu [p.76]
SA20mavt:2566: daśavidham āvaraṇaṃ yathākramaṃ tad vipakṣatvād iti bhūmivipakṣatvāt /
SA20mavt:2570: tathā hi pramuditāyāḥ sarva eva darśanamārgapraheyā āvaraṇaṃ /
SA20mavt:2574: te tv aprahīṇā api prahīṇavat bodhisattvānāṃ na saṃkleśakarā
SA20mavt:2579: daśasu ca bhūmiṣu daśa pāramitā yathākramam atiriktatarā bhavantīti
SA20mavt:2580: vacanāt tad vipakṣasyāpi mātsaryādikasya yathākramaṃ prahāṇam iti
SA20mavt:2582: yadyanyo'pi kleśa āvaraṇaṃ syāt kasmād uktaṃ bhūmiṣv akliṣṭam
SA20mavt:2585: etaddhi bodhisattvānām eva nirvāṇādhigamavibandhair vartate na
SA20mavt:2587: tathā hi - śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhāś ca tasmin satyeva mucyante na tu
SA20mavt:2589: etad bhūmiṣv āvaraṇam uktaṃ na tvetad eva bhūmiṣvāvaraṇam iti kṛtvā /
SA20mavt:2590: kleśas tu śrāvakādibhir bodhisattvānāṃ samāna iti tasyāvaraṇatvena
SA20mavt:2591: bodhisattvabhūmiṣu na vidhir na pratiṣedha iti tasyā'vacane'pyāvaraṇaṃ na
SA20mavt:2593: anya āha - akliṣṭam ajñānaṃ śrāvakādibhir bodhisattvānāṃ samānam iti
SA20mavt:2596: kleśo'pi śrāvakādibhir bodhisattvānāṃ samāna evetyasāvānuṣaṅgiko na
SA20mavt:2598: anye tvāhuḥ - yad bhūmīnām ajñānam āvaraṇaṃ tacchrāvakādīnām
SA20mavt:2601: bodhisattvānān tu kliṣṭaṃ nirvāṇādhigame vibandhahetubhāvād iti /
SA20mavt:2604: prathamayā hi bhūmyā dharmadhātoḥ sarvatragārthaṃ pratividhyatīti /
SA20mavt:2613: yo'haṃ sa paro yo vā paraḥ so'ham iti paratrātmani ca śūnyatāyā
SA20mavt:2616: tato'tra bodhisattvo yathā svārthe tathā parārthe pravartate /
SA20mavt:2618: etac ca tritayam itarāsv api bhūmiṣu vijñeyaṃ /
SA20mavt:2623: sarvākārapariśodhanābhinirhāra eva yogaḥ karaṇīya ityāgamaṃ darśayati
SA20mavt:2624: sūtre hy uktaṃ - yasmāditi daśakuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ prajñākāreṇa
SA20mavt:2626: tata uttaraṃ pariśodhitā yāvad pratyeka buddhyānaṃ saṃvartayanti/
SA20mavt:2630: tata uttaraṃ pariśuddhitaratvād yāvad daśabalabalatvāya saṃvartante /
SA20mavt:2632: yasmād etad asyaiva bhavati dvitīyāyāṃ bhūmau tasmāt tarhītyādi /
SA20mavt:2651: trisāhasramahāsāhasrapramāṇāyām apy agnikaṇḍāyām ātmānaṃ prakṣiped iti /
SA20mavt:2652: uktaṃ hi sūtre - sa ced idaṃ kaścidevaṃ brūyāt - evam ahaṃ tubhyam idaṃ
SA20mavt:2654: saṃśrāvayeyaṃ sa cet tvaṃ mahatyām agnikhaḍāyāṃ samprajvalitāyām
SA20mavt:2662: api tu khalu punaḥ sarvair nirayāpāyaduḥkhasaṃvāsair apy asmābhis
SA20mavt:2663: sarvabuddhadharmāḥ paryeṣitavyāḥ kiṃ punar manuṣyaduḥkhasaṃvāsair iti /
SA20mavt:2667: caturthyam bhūmau samatvād anātmīyatvaṃ dharmadhātoḥ pratividhyati
SA20mavt:2674: bodhisattvasya yā'pi sūtrādidharmatṛṣṇā pūrvam āsīt sā'pi
SA20mavt:2705: pratītyasamutpāde nāsti sa kaścid dharmo yaḥ saṅkliśyate vā viśuddhyate
SA20mavt:2708: tatra na kasyacid dharmasya saṅkleśaṃ vyavadānaṃ vā pratividhyati
SA20mavt:2710: saṅkleśamātratvāt na ca tad vyatirikto'nya ātmā'styātmīyo vā yasmin
SA20mavt:2723: tāni balān nānātvena tat praveśatat pṛṣṭalabdhayor abhimukhībhavanti
SA20mavt:2726: nimitttābhāvatvaṃ pratividhyatīti tāni tāni nimittāni na
SA20mavt:2728: tasmāt tasyāṃ bhūmāv upāyaparamitā'tiriktatarā bhavati yataḥ
SA20mavt:2729: sarvanimittāny animittatvena pratividhyati nimittakṛtaṃ ca vyavahāraṃ na
SA20mavt:2731: tat prativedhāc ca tasyām eva vaśitvaṃ pratilabhate /
SA20mavt:2736: ata evā'sau nityaṃ tathaiveti kṛtvā tathatetyucyate /
SA20mavt:2739: tathā hi nimittam evā'nimittam iti kiñcid
SA20mavt:2759: kathame tad vijñayate navamyā jñanavaṣitāśrayatvaṃ pratividhyatīti ?
SA20mavt:2763: ato'tra jñānavaśitāśrayatvaṃ dharmadhātoḥ pratividdham iti vijñāyate /
SA20mavt:2768: ata āha - yathecchaṃ nirmāṇaiḥ sattvārthakaraṇād iti /
SA20mavt:2772: nirmāṇakāyair yatheṣṭaṃ yasya yathā yasmin kāle yat kartavyaṃ tasya
SA20mavt:2778: akliṣṭam ajñānam ekaikāyām api bhūmyām āvaraṇaṃ tat pratipakṣā
SA20mavt:2779: bodhisattvānāṃ daśa bhūmayo vyavasthitāḥ navamyā daśamyāśca bhūmeḥ
SA20mavt:2780: phalena viśeṣaḥ paridīpito nāvaraṇabheda prativedhaviśeṣeṇa tad vihārasya
SA20mavt:2784: tasmād etad evoktaṃ - bhūmyāvaraṇaṃ pāramitāviśeṣagatyāvaraṇam iti /
SA20mavt:2789: prāg uktāni bahuvidhāni sarvāvaraṇāni dvayāvaraṇāntar gatānīti
SA20mavt:2793: samāsato dvayam eva na punas tṛtīyam apy astīti /
SA20mavt:2797: sarvāvaraṇāni dvayāvaraṇāntargatāni nānyat tṛtīyam astīti gamyate /
SA20mavt:2802: na hy abhidhānād antarbhāvaḥ kin tarhi svabhāvāt /
SA20mavt:2803: api ca vyāpyāvaraṇavacanāt tad apy uktam eva /
SA20mavt:2808: ataḥ śeṣāvaraṇavat tad apy āvaraṇam iti pratipāditam bhavati /
SA20mavt:2809: saukṣmyaprakarṣāvasthaṃ tv akliṣṭam ajñānam kleśavāsanāś ca
SA20mavt:2811: tasmāt saukṣmyaprakarṣād anyathā prekṣituṃ na śakyata ityevam ākhyānam
SA20mavt:2816: prayogāvaraṇaṃ yad udriktam iti teṣām eva rāgādicaritānāṃ taiḥ
SA20mavt:2818: prāptyāvaraṇaṃ yat samam iti samabhāgacaritānāṃ taddhi prāptivibandhe
SA20mavt:2824: samyak prayogāvaraṇaṃ yan navadhā kleśalakṣaṇam iti nava
SA20mavt:2826: tāni samyak prayogasyāvaraṇaṃ bhavanti yathā tathoktaṃ /
SA20mavt:2831: śubhānuttaryāvaraṇaṃ yat pāramitāsu tata uttari śubhābhāvāt /
SA20mavt:2832: tad viśeṣagatyāvaraṇaṃ yad bhūmiṣv iti pāramitā eva hi
SA20mavt:2834: saṅgrahāvaraṇaṃ yat samāsato dvividham iti kleśāvaraṇaṃ
SA20mavt:2837: piṇḍīkṛtaṃ hi sukham udgṛhyate dhāryate ceti //
SA20mavt:2844: /atas- tadbheda-anavabodhe tattva-sva-rūpaṃ dur-avagamam ity/- atas- tattva-prabhedam
SA20mavt:2879: atra tattvā nukūlyāt saṃvṛtir api tattvam ityuktam ityeke /
SA20mavt:2881: yadyenaprakāreṇa na visamvadati tat tathā tattvam iti kṛtvā //3-2//
SA20mavt:2885: ityetad aprasiddham ityata āha - parikalpitaḥ paratantraḥ pariniṣpannaś
SA20mavt:2888: kāraṇena svabhāvas trividho mūlatattvam ity ucyate tat pradarśayann āha
SA20mavt:2902: viśuddhānāṃ hi dharmāṇāṃ caturdhā grahaṇam mataṃ // iti /
SA20mavt:2905: kim atra svabhāvatraye tattvam iṣyata iti /
SA20mavt:2907: kimatra svabhāvatraye'viparītatvam iti yasmāt svabhāvatraye tattvam
SA20mavt:2911: parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ nityam asad iti yatra hi bālānāṃ
SA20mavt:2914: tasmād asadātmakatvād abhrāntitvāc ca parikalpitalakṣaṇam asattvaṃ /
SA20mavt:2916: aviparītatvād iti aviparītārtho'tra tattvārthaṃ iti darśayati /
SA20mavt:2917: paratantralakṣaṇam sacca na ca tattvata iti /
SA20mavt:2920: etad eva pratipādayann āha bhrāntimātratvād iti /
SA20mavt:2921: etad uktaṃ bhavati - yat khyāti māyopādānavat tad asti /
SA20mavt:2922: yathā khyāti grāhyagrāhakākāreṇa naitad eva māyāpuruṣādivat /
SA20mavt:2924: ityetat paratantrasvabhāve tattvaṃ anyathā vidyamānasya svātmany
SA20mavt:2935: svabhāvatrayasya tattvam uktaṃ na tu lakṣaṇam ityataḥ pṛcchati /
SA20mavt:2936: athavā mūlatattvā'nantaraṃ lakṣaṇatattvam uktaṃ taccā'prasiddham iti
SA20mavt:2941: pudgaladharmayoḥ samāropā'pavādadarśanaṃ yasya jñānān na pravartate
SA20mavt:2949: pudgaladharmayoḥ samāropā'pavādadarśanaṃ yasya lakṣaṇasya paricchedān na
SA20mavt:2952: tac ca vyavahāreṇa tattvaṃ na tu svabhāvena yasmāt
