SA20mavt:3581: tac ca yā'nyatra nāmnopalabdhis tatra viṣayasvabhāvaḥ parikalpyate /
SA20mavt:3583: vikalpitaṃ rūpaṃ yo rūpasya paratantraḥ svabhāva iti
SA20mavt:3585: kim arthaṃ punar idaṃ vikalpitaṃ rūpam ucyata ityata āha - tatra hi
SA20mavt:3590: dharmatārūpaṃ yo rūpasya pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāva iti /
SA20mavt:3593: yathā rūpam tridhā bhittvā triṣu svabhāveṣv antarbhāvitam evaṃ
SA20mavt:3600: tatra pratibhāseṣu vedanādiṣu yo'tyantam asadbhūto grāhyagrāhakabhāvo
SA20mavt:3601: rūpapratibhāseṣu yathā grāhyabhāvaḥ parikalpyate sā parikalpitā
SA20mavt:3603: yasmin grāhyagrāheka vikalpaḥ kriyate sā vikalpitā vedanā yāvad
SA20mavt:3607: evaṃ dhātvāyatanādiṣv api yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vistareṇa vaktavyaṃ /
SA20mavt:3608: rūpavedane yāvat saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtam iti yo nāmābhidheyo bhāvaḥ so'pi
SA20mavt:3614: nanu paratantra eva manuṣyādibhāvena nāmnocyate na parikalpita ity
SA20mavt:3619: yathā hi nāmārthe pravartate tathā tathaiva nāsti /
SA20mavt:3620: bālas tu tat svabhāvam abhiniviśanti tac ca mithyā'dhyavasitaṃ na tu
SA20mavt:3624: yadi vṛkṣādiśabdānāṃ tad arthānāṃ cābhinnarūpatā evaṃ nāmnas
SA20mavt:3628: namno'pi vānyat vācakārthasya ca vācyaṃ prasajyata
SA20mavt:3632: abhāvavācakānām arthavatām asattvaṃ tad arthasyābhāvarūpatvāt tad
SA20mavt:3635: śabda eva hi tatra vṛkṣo nārthaḥ /
SA20mavt:3640: vailakṣaṇye ca vācyavācakaniyamo na syāt niyamakāraṇābhāvāt /
SA20mavt:3643: utpanno'pi punaḥ punar utpādayitavya iti prasaṅga punaḥ panar
SA20mavt:3645: nāpyabhivyañjayati yasmād arthaṃ gṛhītvā nāma kriyate na ca
SA20mavt:3647: tenaiva nāmnā tamevārtham anyo na gṛhṇāti yas tan na jānāti /
SA20mavt:3650: na ca vyaṅgyeṣu ghaṭapaṭādiṣu vyañjakaniyamo dṛṣṭa iti sarvo'rthaḥ
SA20mavt:3653: yatmāt kuthārajalādīnāṃ gandhādyutpādayitṛtvam iṣṭaṃ na tu
SA20mavt:3657: evaṃ triṣu svabhāveṣu skandhādīnām anantarbhāvād daśavidhaṃ
SA20mavt:3661: skandhādyartho nokta ityataḥ sa idānīm ucyate //3-16//
SA20mavt:3668: vā bāhyaṃ vā audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā yadvā
SA20mavt:3669: dūre yadvā'ntike ityevam anekārthena bahūnām atītānāgatādīnāṃ
SA20mavt:3675: atra kāraṇam āha - skandhānāṃ rūpādilakṣaṇasya vedanādilakṣaṇebhyaḥ
SA20mavt:3678: kim atra kāraṇam ebhis tribhiraṅgaiḥ skandhārtho vyavasthāpyate ?
SA20mavt:3679: rāśyartho hi skandhārtha ityata evaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
SA20mavt:3682: yathā rūpaskandha evaṃ vedanādayo'pi skandhā veditavyāḥ /
SA20mavt:3683: tatra yo'yam ekātmagrāho yathā puruṣa evedaṃ sarvaṃ yad bhūtaṃ yac ca
SA20mavt:3685: pratipakṣeṇa yathā skandhārthe kauśalyaṃ kāryaṃ tathoktaṃ /
SA20mavt:3690: trividhaḥ sammoha ekatvasammohaḥ saṃvṛti sammoho lakṣaṇasaṅkīrṇasammohaś
SA20mavt:3699: bījārtho dhātvarthaḥ tadyathā svarṇo sati svarṇadhātur ucyate
SA20mavt:3701: sa ca phalabhedāt tridhā bhidyate - grāhakadhātuḥ grāhyadhātuḥ tad
SA20mavt:3704: cakṣurdhāturādir yeṣāṃ manaḥparyantās te cakṣur dhātvādayaḥ /
SA20mavt:3709: te'pyevaṃ sabhāgānāṃ rūpādīnāṃ hetubhāvād dhātava ucyante /
SA20mavt:3713: te'pi sabhāgānām eva cakṣurādivijñānānāṃ hetubhūtatvād dhātava
SA20mavt:3721: evaṃ tvālayavijñānam eva dhātuśabdavācyaṃ na cakṣurādaya iti cintyam
SA20mavt:3725: atra pūrvacakṣurādaya uttaracakṣurādīnām eva hetavo bhavanti na
SA20mavt:3726: tatrānyaḥ kaścid ātmā'nyo vā hetuvidyata ityevaṃ dhātukauśalyād
SA20mavt:3733: aparaśabdasya ca sāmānyatvāt praśnaḥ kim aparam iti /
SA20mavt:3735: aparaśabdo'vatiṣṭhata iti jñāpanārtham āha - āyatanam iti /
SA20mavt:3764: yad uktaṃ cakṣuāradyāyatanānām anugrahopaghātāt tad adhiṣṭhāna eva
SA20mavt:3766: rūpapratiṣedhena cakṣurādīnām āyatanānām apy asattvādātmavad iti
SA20mavt:3769: yasmāt parikalpitarūpasyaivātra pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate na vikalpatārūpasya
SA20mavt:3773: ya ālayavijñānasya sādhāraṇārthapratibhāso yaś ca sattvapratibhāsaḥ
SA20mavt:3777: nanvevaṃ dvayam āśritya cakṣur vijñānādaya utpadyanta iti sūtravacanena
SA20mavt:3781: utpannānutpannāvasthayor bhāvād abhāvāc ca svātmani vṛttivirodhāt /
SA20mavt:3782: tasmād avaśyaṃ vijñānanirbhāsād bhinnā rūpādayo'bhyupagantavyā iti
SA20mavt:3786: vasanāpariṇāmāc ca rūpādyābhāsaṃ punar vijñānaṃ jāyate /
SA20mavt:3787: evaṃ vijñānanirbhāsātmakatvena vāsanāhito vijñānapratyaya ukta iti
SA20mavt:3791: athavā yathā bāhyārthavādibhir vijñānena sahaja ālambanapratyayo
SA20mavt:3802: api cālambyālambakabhāvaḥ sarvatropacaryata eva na mukhyo'sti /
SA20mavt:3803: nahi vijñānam utpannam anutpannaṃ vā viṣayam ālambate /
SA20mavt:3812: notpadyamānasya nirarthakaṃ yasmād viṣayasadbhāve vijñānaṃ tan
SA20mavt:3817: na vikalaiḥ pratyayaiḥ kāryam utpadyate atiprasaṅgāt /
SA20mavt:3819: na ca bāhyārtha ālambanapratyayo vijñānasya tena vināpi bhāvāt /
SA20mavt:3820: tasmāt sarvam eva vijñānaṃ taimirikādīnām iva
SA20mavt:3828: asyotpādādidam utpadyate yad utāvidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti vistaraḥ
SA20mavt:3835: etad eva pratipādayann āha - saṃskārādīnāṃ jarāmaraṇaparyantānāṃ
SA20mavt:3837: saṃskārādīnāṃ hy anityānāṃ nityaḥ puruṣādiko hetur viṣamo visadṛśa
SA20mavt:3840: na ca nityasya svarūpavikriyā'stīti viṣamahetau hetutvakalpanād
SA20mavt:3847: satyātmani saṃskārādīnām avidyādipratyayapravṛttitvaṃ na tv astīti
SA20mavt:3851: phalāpavādo na santy avidyādipratyayāḥ saṃskāradaya iti kalpanād iti /
SA20mavt:3852: tad yathā - sucaritaduścaritaparalokāpavādināṃ nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti
SA20mavt:3858: avidyādīnāṃ sattāmātreṇa saṃskārāṇāṃ hy utpādanasamarthānām api
SA20mavt:3864: vā yaḥ kartṛtvagrāhas tasyaṃ pratipakṣeṇa veditavyaṃ /
SA20mavt:3865: na hy atrātmānyo vā'vidyāvyatirekeṇa śubhāśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ kartā /
SA20mavt:3876: satyaṃ vaden na ca kruddhed dadyād alpoo'pi yācitaḥ /
SA20mavt:3877: ebhis tribhir iha shtānair devānāṃ samitiṃ vrajet //
SA20mavt:3879: athavā sthānaṃ sambhavaḥ asthānaṃ punar asambhavaḥ /
SA20mavt:3883: tac ca saptavidham api triṣvantarbhavati karmakleśajanmapāratantryeṣu /
SA20mavt:3886: tatra gamanaṃ duścaritāyatattvaṃ pāratantryañceti pradarśayann āha -
SA20mavt:3890: teṣām ekāntena duḥkhatvān na kasyacit tatra gamanecchā bhavati /
SA20mavt:3891: karmaṇāṃ balavattvād durgatigetutvāc ca duścaritasyānicchato'pi tatra
SA20mavt:3907: abhedena kuśalapakṣaṃ nivṛṇvantīti nivaraṇāni bhedena punar yathākramaṃ
SA20mavt:3908: pravrajatyābhiratiṃ tad anurūpe kāyavākkarmāṇi sabrahmacāribhiḥ samyak
SA20mavt:3916: yatra duḥkhaṃ nāsti tac ca nirvāṇaṃ tasyākaraṇam aprāptir nirvāṇaṃ na
SA20mavt:3918: athavā duḥkhasyānto yasmād duḥkhādanyaduḥkhaṃ na sandhīyate tat
SA20mavt:3919: tādṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ na karotītyapratisandhikaṃ duḥkham na karotītyarthaḥ /
SA20mavt:3921: samotpattau pāratantryaṃ dvayor apūrvācaramayor iti sahitayor ityarthaḥ /
SA20mavt:3924: cakravartinos tu cātur dvīpaka iti kecit /
SA20mavt:3929: tathā hi yadekasmiñcāturmahādvīpake tuṣiteṣu manuṣyeṣu ca
SA20mavt:3934: tuṣiteṣūpapattiṃ manuṣyeṣu ca janmaparigrahādikaṃ sarvaṃ darśayatīti
SA20mavt:3945: tatra pāratantryaṃ puruṣasya prāptir na tu striyaḥ /
SA20mavt:3955: te vadhādayaḥ kāyavāk-kriyāsvabhāvā dṛṣṭisampannasya na samudācaranti
SA20mavt:3958: tad aprahāṇaṃ punas tat pratipakṣeṇa mārgānutpannatvāt /
SA20mavt:3961: yadi hi svatantraḥ kaścit syān na duścaritena durgatiṃ gacchet /
SA20mavt:3970: atra ca dvayādhipattyārthata iti yuktau kārikānukūlārtham
SA20mavt:3972: tasmād bhāṣyakāra āha - teṣu tadādhipatyād iti /
SA20mavt:3985: evaṃ śrotrādiṣv api yathāsambhavaṃ vistareṇa vācyaṃ /
SA20mavt:3990: sthāne jīvitendriyasyādhipatyam ityatraiva kāraṇam āha - tad
SA20mavt:3997: na ca tatra sparśādīnām avasthāna ādhipatyaṃ yujyate /
SA20mavt:4001: putrotpattau kulāvyuparatatā vartata iti putrotpattiḥ kulasandhānaṃ /
SA20mavt:4002: etad eva darśayann āha - prasavādhipatyād iti /
SA20mavt:4005: yatra stīndriyaṃ puruṣendriyañcas tastatra kulavyavasthānam asti /
SA20mavt:4007: kāmāvacareṣv api ca deveṣu strīndriye puruṣendriye ca sati
SA20mavt:4009: nahi gandharvādīnāṃ tatrādhipatyaṃ satyapi gandharvādau paṇḍakādiṣu
SA20mavt:4015: vedanendriyāṇi pañca - sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saumanasyaṃ daurmanasyam upekṣā ca
SA20mavt:4038: pūrvokteṣu navasu daurmanasyam adhikaṃ prakṣipya daśa bhavanti /
SA20mavt:4050: samādhir ityetasmin śaikṣamārgam ājñendriyam ity ucyate
SA20mavt:4055: evam indriyakauśalasya yaḥ puruṣanārāyaṇeśvarādiṣv adhipatigrāhaḥ sa
SA20mavt:4064: evam prakāraścātīto hetus tatphalaṃ cetyataḥ phalasya
SA20mavt:4076: kāryānutpādād anutpannasya ca vināśābhāvāt phalahetvor anupayogo
SA20mavt:4087: śāstre ca yat kiñcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti vacanāt /
SA20mavt:4088: satyavyavasthāyāṃ sarvā sāsravā sanimittā sukhā duḥkhā sukhāduḥkhā
SA20mavt:4089: ca vedanā duḥkhasatyārtha iti pradarśayan bhāṣyakāra āha - tatra
SA20mavt:4091: sarvā vedanā duḥkham iti kuta etat ?
SA20mavt:4092: ata āha - yatkiñcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti kṛtveti /
SA20mavt:4096: vedanānimittaṃ panar vedanāsthānīyā dharmā veditavyā iti /
SA20mavt:4101: duḥkhaṃ yayā pratipattyā janyate sā pratipattiḥ samudayasatyaṃ /
SA20mavt:4102: sā punar vedanāyāṃ vedanāsthāniyeṣu ca dharmeṣu tṛṣṇāhetupūrvikā
SA20mavt:4104: saṃkṣepataś ca bhavasamudbhavikaṃ karmasamudaya satyam ity uktam bhavati /
SA20mavt:4121: tatra guṇadoṣajñānena parataḥ svayañceti ata evāha - vṛttau yathāyogam iti /
SA20mavt:4124: tatra nirodhe śāntādyākāraiḥ mārge nairyāṇikādyākārair jñānaṃ
SA20mavt:4132: śrāvakayānam iti paradghoṣasaṃniśrayeṇa niryāṇāt śrāvakāyanm iti
SA20mavt:4134: tenaiveti nirvāṇasaṃsārayor guṇadoṣajñānena svayam aśrutvā parato
SA20mavt:4147: evaṃ yānatrayakuśalasya yogamātradarśanād ātmā yogīti grāho
SA20mavt:4154: ityata āha - saṃskṛtā'saṃskṛtam iti sarvapaścād udiṣṭatvāt /
SA20mavt:4155: tatra saṃskṛtaṃ saprajñaptikāt sahetukāc ca nimittāt asaṃskṛtaṃ punaḥ
SA20mavt:4158: tat pradarśayann āha - tatra saprajñaptir nāmakāyādaya iti /
SA20mavt:4165: ata eva dattaphalād vyavacchedārthaṃ bījasaṅgṛhītam ityāha /
SA20mavt:4171: dehaḥ sendriyaṃ śarīraṃ tadābhāsam ālayavijñānaṃ dehasaṅgṛhītaṃ
SA20mavt:4174: tad dvayaṃ śeṣāṇi vijñānānyadhipativastutvena bhuñjata iti bhogaḥ /
SA20mavt:4180: tat saṃskṛtaṃ na kevalaṃ tadeveti darśayati /
SA20mavt:4188: anye tu manyante - svabhāvaviśeṣaprajñāpanāt prajñapter nimittaṃ
SA20mavt:4194: tatra mano yan nityaṃ manyanākāram iti /
SA20mavt:4195: ahaṃ mameti yan nityaṃ manyate tanmata ucyate /
SA20mavt:4196: tac ca samprayuktam ātmamohātmadṛṣṭyātmasnehātmamānaiḥ pañcabhiś ca
SA20mavt:4204: asaṃskṛtaṃ punaḥ praśamaś ca nirodhaḥ praśamārthaś ca tathateti yuktaṃ
SA20mavt:4208: nanu ca nirodhena tathatayā na kaścit sambandho'sti kathaṃ praśamārthatvaṃ
SA20mavt:4214: evaṃ vigrahabhedād ekābhidhānena nirvāṇamārgayor grahaṇaṃ praśama iti /
SA20mavt:4217: yadi karmakleśābhyām anabhisaṃskṛtād asaṃskṛtena ca prabhāvitād
SA20mavt:4218: asaṃskṛtam iti brūyān na doṣaḥ syād iti /
SA20mavt:4219: ityetenārthena skandhādiṣu jñānaṃ skandhādikauśalyaṃ veditavyam iti / [p.123]
SA20mavt:4226: ataḥ samāsato dvividham ityāha - ādarśatattvaṃ dṛśyatattvañca /
SA20mavt:4229: kim arthaṃ punas tad ādarśatattvam ityucyate ?
SA20mavt:4244: katham ityata āha - dṛṣṭānasanniśrayeṇa yuktyā nigrahād iti /
SA20mavt:4251: tac ca pañca vastūni tatra sarvajñeyānupraveśāt /
SA20mavt:4255: tena hy ātmagrāhavastu sarvābhiprāyamukhena praviśatīti yathā pūrvam
SA20mavt:4269: sūtre pratipakaṣatvena bodhipakṣo'numata iti pradarśanārtham āha -
SA20mavt:4273: te punaḥ saptatriṃśat - catvāri smṛtypasthānāni yāvadāryāṣṭāṅga
SA20mavt:4275: tad bhāvanā bṛṃhaṇāropaṇā abhyāso bahulā kriyeti paryāyāḥ /
SA20mavt:4277: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ smṛtyupasthānabhāvanaiva pūrvam ucyate nānyā
SA20mavt:4289: sa ca guṇadoṣānavabodhaḥ sukhādyabhiniveśaś ca satyadarśanād vinivartata
SA20mavt:4294: tathā hi pratidinam abhisaṃskriyamāṇo vikriyata eva kāya iti kāyena
SA20mavt:4297: kim artham etad ityāha - tasya sadauṣṭhulyasaṃskāralakṣaṇatvād iti /
SA20mavt:4298: yasmād duḥkhasatyasya sadauṣṭhulyāḥ saṃskārāḥ lakṣaṇaṃ svabhāvaḥ
SA20mavt:4299: kāyena ca dauṣṭhulyaṃ prabhāvyate tasmāt kāyaparīkṣayā duḥkhasatyam
SA20mavt:4301: dauṣṭhulyaṃ na vijñāyata ityata āha - dauṣṭhulyaṃ hi saṃskāraduḥkhateti
SA20mavt:4303: sa ca sarvaviplavastv iti dauṣṭhulyamāryāṇāṃ pratikūlatvāc ca duḥkhatā
SA20mavt:4305: anartho janmedaṃ sati hi janane santi ripavo
SA20mavt:4307: anarthās te na syur yadi na bhavato nāśavibhavā-
SA20mavt:4308: vajāte vṛkṣe syān na hi dahanadavavāyucyutir api //
SA20mavt:4311: sarvaṃ sāsravaṃ vastvāryā duḥkhatā paśyanti nā'nāsavaṃ mārgasatyasya
SA20mavt:4313: sūtre'py uktaṃ - samāsataḥ pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkham iti /
SA20mavt:4319: sā tv abījāpyarthasantāne kadācid āhārādyapacārād bhavati /
SA20mavt:4320: na cāsau dauṣṭhulyaṃ bhavitum arhatya nāsravatvād iti /
SA20mavt:4324: tasmāt sukhādyavakāśasahitena kāyena pratikṣaṇabhāvinā tad dauṣṭhulyaṃ
SA20mavt:4333: ata eva saṃskāraduḥkhatayā sarvasāsravaṃ vastvāryaiḥ duḥkhatvenālokita
SA20mavt:4337: tatra sukhā vedanā tat saṃyogāviyogatṛṣṇāyā hetuḥ /
SA20mavt:4339: aduḥkhasukhā tad avasthābhir atitṛṣṇāyās tat saṃyogāviyogatṛṣṇāyāś ca
SA20mavt:4341: sa duḥkhavedanayā spṛṣṭaḥ kāmasukham abhinandatīti vacanāt duḥkhāpi
SA20mavt:4344: sa hi vedanāṃ svarūpataḥ kāraṇataḥ kāryato'nityato
SA20mavt:4354: tasmāt tat parīkṣayā nirodhasatyam avatarati śāntatvena /
SA20mavt:4396: vīryaṃ caturdhā pravartata iti vipakṣapratipakṣayor utpanānutpannabhedena
SA20mavt:4398: utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāyeti vistara
SA20mavt:4399: itīdam āgamena vīryasyaiva caturdhā pravṛttiṃ darśayati /
SA20mavt:4401: tatrāyāṃ śeṣo granghaḥ - prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryam
SA20mavt:4403: evam anutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāya
SA20mavt:4405: evam anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādaya chandañjanayatīti
SA20mavt:4438: tatra cchandsamādhir yadā chandādhipatyād vīryabhāvanāyāṃ sagauravaṃ
SA20mavt:4440: vīryasamādhir yadā vīryam ārabhamāṇaḥ sātatyaprayogāt spṛśati
SA20mavt:4442: cittasamādhir yadā pūrvasamādhibījam āgamya citta eva cittaṃ dhārayan
SA20mavt:4445: sthitiratra cittasthitiḥ samādhir veditavya iti samādhigrahaṇaṃ
SA20mavt:4447: yata ārabdhavīryasya cittakarmaṇyatā catvāra ṛddhipādā bhavanti ataḥ
SA20mavt:4450: kim prayojanā kiṃ hetukā cetyata āha -
SA20mavt:4454: te ca pañcadoṣā na vijñāyanta ityataḥ pṛcchati katame pañca doṣā iti /
SA20mavt:4458: ete hi ṣaḍdoṣā ityata āha - tatra layauddhatyam eko doṣaḥ kriyata iti
SA20mavt:4472: yadyevaṃ tena vaktavyam eṣāṃ prahāṇāya katham aṣṭau prahāṇasaṃskārā
SA20mavt:4479: kathaṃ punar ete kausīdyaprahāṇāya vyavasthāpyanta ityata āha - te
SA20mavt:4481: āśrayo'rthāśritas tasya nimittaṃ phalam eva ca / iti /
SA20mavt:4486: katham ityato bravīti - sampratyaye saty abhilāṣād iti /
SA20mavt:4489: katham ityata āha - prārabdhavīryasya samādhiviśeṣā'dhigamād iti /
SA20mavt:4497: atra ca vīryaṃ sahetukaṃ saphalaṃ ca kausīdyapratipakṣeṇoktaṃ /
SA20mavt:4503: smṛtyādīnāṃ punar lakṣaṇavivakṣayedam āha - te punaḥ smṛtyādayo
SA20mavt:4509: upasthitasmṛtir hi samprajanyavān bhavatyevetyata āha - smṛtyasampramoṣe
SA20mavt:4514: etad uktaṃ bhavati - sūpasthitasmṛtiravavāde līnaṃ cittam uddhtaṃ vā
SA20mavt:4516: layauddhatyavigamāya ca tad abhisaṃskaroti layauddhatyavigamāc copekṣāṃ
SA20mavt:4519: atra ca karmaṇyatāsthitir iti svārthe bhāvapratyayaḥ svapeṭatvādivat //
SA20mavt:4530: pratilabhate chandādhipatyato yāvat pravicayādhipatyataḥ na tv
SA20mavt:4539: ataścandagrahaṇenātrābhilāṣalakṣaṇā śraddhaiva gṛhyate na tu cchanda iti
SA20mavt:4550: śraddhadhāno hi saṃsāracārakān niḥsaraṇārthaṃ vīryam ārabhate /
SA20mavt:4556: kiṃ tarhi ropite mokṣabhāgīyakuśalamūle chandādīnām ādhipatyata
SA20mavt:4558: etad eva pradarśayann āha - chandādhipatyataḥ śraddhāyā indriyatvam iti
SA20mavt:4566: atra tvetad vaktavyaṃ - ropite mokṣabhāgīye kuśalamūle ropitāvasthātaś
SA20mavt:4568: yasmāt tadavasthāyāṃ tad ādhipatyāt teṣām indriyatvam avasthāpyata iti //
SA20mavt:4571: tānyeva śraddhādīni balavanti balānyucyante indriyānantaram uktānīti
SA20mavt:4572: teṣāṃ punar balavattvaṃ kuta ityata āha -
SA20mavt:4575: etad eva pradarśayann āha - yadā tānīti śraddhādīndriyāṇi /
SA20mavt:4578: vyavakīryante atyarthaṃ tanutvād antarāntarā samudācārābhāvān na
SA20mavt:4580: tānīndriyāṇi vipakṣair avakīryante tadā tad vipakṣasyānirlikhitatvāt
SA20mavt:4583: tatra hy abhedenendriyāṇy abhipretāni atra tu nirvedhabhāgīyasya
SA20mavt:4586: atra evātrāha etānyevendriyāṇi balāny ucyanta iti /
SA20mavt:4588: ayaṃ heturasyaiva phalasya idañca phalam asyaiva hetor ityevaṃ
SA20mavt:4591: upasthitasmṛter vipakṣepābhāvāc cittaṃ samādhīyate ekāgraṃ bhavati /
SA20mavt:4600: dvau dvau nirvedhabhāgīyāvīndriyāṇi balāni ca / iti /
SA20mavt:4602: śraddhādiprabhāvitāni vā bhavanti tathā nirvedhabhāgīyāny api /
SA20mavt:4608: mṛdutvād ayuktatvād eṣāṃ kuśalānām eṣu balānām indriyāṇyeva /
SA20mavt:4610: adhimātratvād eṣām indiryāṇām asambhavāt kṣāntayo'gradharmāś ca
SA20mavt:4628: tad anyasāsravadharmaśreṣṭhatvāc ca laukikā agradharmā ity ucyante /
SA20mavt:4629: teṣāṃ tv agratā tad anantaraṃ darśanamārgotpatteḥ /
SA20mavt:4630: te ca kṣaṇikāḥ śeṣāṇi nirvedhabhāgīyāni santānavanti /
SA20mavt:4643: adṛṣṭapūrvasya tattvasya tat prathamata ālocanād darśanaṃ
SA20mavt:4644: āryabhūmiprāpakatvān mārga ityato darśanamārga ity ucyate /
SA20mavt:4648: tatra tattvābhisambodho bodhinirvikalpaṃ jñānaṃ tatra ṣaṭ smṛṭyādīni
SA20mavt:4650: dharmapravicayastv avabodhātmakatvād bodhiḥ itareṣāṃ ca sahāyabhāvād
SA20mavt:4652: anyaḥ punar āha - ānantaryamārgagṛhīto dharmapravicayo bodhyaṅgaṃ
SA20mavt:4654: tatra bodher āśrāṅgaṃ smṛtiḥ smṛtbalena tasminnālambane'vikṣepaṇāt /
SA20mavt:4662: kim arthaṃ punar asaṅkleśāṅgaṃ tridhā deśitam iti /
SA20mavt:4669: kathaṃ nidānam ityato bravīti - dauṣṭhulyahetukatvāt saṅkleśasya tasyāś
SA20mavt:4689: anye tv āhuḥ - prahāṇair mārgair darśanaheye saṃkleśe prahīṇe tat
SA20mavt:4691: jñeye suniścitā yā prajñā sātra prajñopekṣety ucyate kṛtakṛtyatvāt
SA20mavt:4703: kramaḥ punar eṣāṃ kāritrā'nukrameṇa bhāvanāmārga iti vistaraḥ /
SA20mavt:4709: lokottarāt tu nirvikalpāt nirvikalpasya sato'pi samyag
SA20mavt:4713: sā punaḥ kiṃviṣayetyata āha - yayā svādhigamam iti /
SA20mavt:4717: tayā samyag dṛṣṭyā paricchinnasya tattvasya samyag vācā samyak
SA20mavt:4718: saṅkalpena ca paratra prāpaṇāt samyaksaṅkalpaḥ samyagvāk ca
SA20mavt:4720: ata evāha - samutthānayā vācā tat prāpaṇād iti /
SA20mavt:4721: samyak saṃkalpo hi vācaḥ samutthānaṃ nāvitarkya nāvicārya vācaṃ
SA20mavt:4723: samāhito'pi tābhyāṃ samanvāgato veditavyas tad utpattilābhāt na tu
SA20mavt:4726: katham ityata āha - tair hi samyag vākkarmāntājīvair yathākramaṃ -
SA20mavt:4727: dṛṣṭau śīle'tha saṃlekhe parivijñaptir iṣyate / [p.138] iti /
SA20mavt:4733: pareṣāṃ niyogādanena tattvam adhigataṃ tathā hy upaśamasaṃsaktaṃ
SA20mavt:4738: samyakkarmānto hi duścarita-virodhītyatas tena sambandhāgato jīvitahetor
SA20mavt:4739: apy akṛtyaṃ na karotītyata āryakāntaśīlavānayam iti sambhāvanā
SA20mavt:4742: katham ityata āha - dharmeṇa mātrayā ca cīvarādyeṣaṇād iti
SA20mavt:4745: tena saṃlekhe sambhāvanā bhavati niścayenāsyopakaraṇatṛṣṇā prahīṇā
SA20mavt:4746: tathā hyasau kevalam āśrayasthityartham eva nyāyena mātrayā ca
SA20mavt:4748: tatra samyag dṛṣṭyā ābhimāniko na bhavati yathābhūtaṃ
SA20mavt:4750: samyaksaṅkalpena samutthāpitavācā siṃhanādaṃ nadati samyag vāk
SA20mavt:4753: tattu na jñāyata ityāha - samyagvyāyāmsmṛtisamādhaya iti /
SA20mavt:4754: te ca kasya vipakṣasya pratipakṣā ityata āha - eṣāṃ punar yathākramaṃ -
SA20mavt:4759: katham ityata āha - teneti samyag vyāyāmena mārgabhāvanāt /
SA20mavt:4762: tena bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya tat pratipakṣaṃ
SA20mavt:4777: naikāntike vā mārge yuganaddavāhini vā tad
SA20mavt:4780: samāpattyāvaraṇātmakam akliṣṭam ajñānaṃ tasya tṛtīyasya samyak
SA20mavt:4787: samādhipariśuddhiṃ samyak samādhinā samāpattyāvaraṇena viṣamam iti
SA20mavt:4803: sā ca smṛtyupasthānabhāvanām ārabhya yāvad balabhāvaneti /
SA20mavt:4805: iyaṃ hi śaikṣāṇāṃ bodhyaṅgabhāvanā mārgabhāvanā ca /
SA20mavt:4830: eṣa hi teṣu viśeṣa ucyate na kevalam anupalambhayogenaiva manasi kurvanti
SA20mavt:4839: yadi na visaṃyogāya kimarthaṃ tarhi pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayatītyata āha -
SA20mavt:4862: tatra yo gotra eva vartate na cittotpādādiṣu sa gotrastha ihābhipretaḥ /
SA20mavt:4863: sa punar uttarāvasthāsv anuvartate na nivartate /
SA20mavt:4864: kecit tacca gotraṃ kuśalamūlasvabhāvam iti varṇayanti /
SA20mavt:4865: kuśalamūlānyeva hi kānicic chrāvakagotram ity ucyante /
SA20mavt:4871: aśaikṣāvasthāyāṃ tu śrāvaka ity ucyate pratyekabuddha iti vā /
SA20mavt:4879: tasya prayogamūlabhūtatvāt tasminn utpanne prayogāvatāra iti tad
SA20mavt:4887: ata evoktaṃ - uttarottaraphalaṃ gotrāc cittotpāda ityevam ādi /
SA20mavt:4906: ata āha - tata ūrdhvam avasthā'bhāvād iti /
SA20mavt:4926: eṣaiva bodhisattvasya darśanamārgaḥ niryāṇāvasthā tad uttarāsu ṣaṭsu
SA20mavt:4932: bhavati buddhatva iti buddhair bhagavadbhiḥ sammukhavyākaraṇena vyākriyate
SA20mavt:4935: pratisamvidaḥ pratilabhata ity anuttaro mahādhārmakathiko bhavati /
SA20mavt:4945: anye tu niḥśeṣāgantukamalāpagamāt suviśuddho dharmadhātur eva
SA20mavt:4950: svābhāviko yasmin kāye vyavasthite'bhisambudhyate yena kāyena
SA20mavt:4951: niṣṭhāgatair bodhisattvaiḥ saha parṣanmaṇḍalena dharmasaṃgītim anubhavati
SA20mavt:4959: aśuddhaśuddhaśuddhā ca viśuddhā ca yathārhataḥ / iti /
SA20mavt:4960: tatrāśuddhāvasthā hetvavasthām upādāya yāvat prayogād iti [p.144]
SA20mavt:4974: teṣāṃ ca bahudhā vyavasthānaṃ kathaṃ vijñāpanīyam ityata āha -
SA20mavt:4979: āditagrahaṇād ayaṃ prayuktaḥ - srotāapannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmī
SA20mavt:4989: tadidaṃ samāsena pañcavidhaṃ phalaṃ - bhājanatvaṃ balaṃ rucir vṛddhir
SA20mavt:4991: tatra bhājanatvaṃ yaḥ kuśalānukūlo vipāka iti /
SA20mavt:4999: ruciryā pūrvābhyāsāt kuśale rucir ityatīteṣu janmasu
SA20mavt:5004: trayaṃ balavṛddhyor viśeṣaḥ balaṃ hi mandakuśalavipākāpekṣyaṃ dārḍhyaṃ
SA20mavt:5017: asyaiva pañcavidhasya phalasya samāsoktasya prabhedaḥ samāsena nirdiṣṭaḥ
SA20mavt:5034: tatra cittotpādo gotrānukūlatvāc cittotpādaḥ phalam iti /
SA20mavt:5038: vipakṣa eva phalam iti vipakṣaphalaṃ prahāṇamārgo yena kleśebhyo
SA20mavt:5040: ādiphalaṃ yat pūrvam uktaṃ prathamato lokottaradharmapratilambha iti /
SA20mavt:5041: vipakṣaśabdo yadyapi pratipakṣavibandhanārthenāvaraṇam ucyate atra tu
SA20mavt:5042: vipakṣaḥ pratipakṣo'bhipreta iti āvaraṇanirvāsapakṣo vipakṣa iti vigrahāt
SA20mavt:5057: atra kāraṇam āha - tad anyayā nottaratvād iti /
SA20mavt:5063: etad api samāptiphalam eva yataḥ sarvasavāsanākleśopakleśaprahāṇād
SA20mavt:5066: etad anyat phalaṃ samāsanirdeśataḥ vyāsatastvaparimāṇam iti /
SA20mavt:5094: aśuddhaśuddhāvasthā dve avasthe phalāvasthā sakaraṇīyāvasthā ca / [p.148]
SA20mavt:5099: anuttarāvasthā ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tad uttarāvasthāntarābhāvāt
SA20mavt:5100: sā ca prāptyavasthā anuśaṃsāvasthā kṛtyānuṣṭhānāvasthā ca yāḥ
SA20mavt:5106: tatra saṃgrahato vipākaphalādīni pañca phalāni teṣu
SA20mavt:5109: teṣām eva pañcānāṃ prabhedaḥ śeṣāṇy uttarottaraphalāni veditavyāni /
SA20mavt:5126: nirdeśaḥ visaṃyogaphalam abhyāsaphalasya samāptiphalasya ca nirdeśaḥ
SA20mavt:5139: idānīm iti lakṣaṇādiṣaṭkanirdeśānantaram ityarthaḥ tad anantaram
SA20mavt:5144: asādhāraṇam iha ca prādhānyenocyata iti pradarśayann āha -
SA20mavt:5145: yānānuttaryam idānīṃ vaktavyaṃ tad ucyata iti /
SA20mavt:5158: etad eva tṛtayaṃ pratipattir ālambanaṃ samudāgamaś ca /
SA20mavt:5161: ālambanasya punaḥ pāramitādayo dharmā dharmadhātuś ca /
SA20mavt:5165: tadvattvāt tad ālambanaṃ bodhisattvānām anuttaryam ucyate /
SA20mavt:5169: sa ca tato'nyaviśiṣṭasamudāgamābhāvād anuttara ity ucyate /
SA20mavt:5171: atra punaḥ pratipattir bodhisattvānāṃ sādhāra saphalā ca mahāyānam
SA20mavt:5173: etac ca trividhenānuttaryeṇānantarokte nānuttaryam ity ucyate /
SA20mavt:5174: atha vā mahāyānaṃ sarvavikalpaprapañcavigataṃ jñānaṃ sasamprayogaṃ
SA20mavt:5179: asya ca mahāyānasyābhidhāyikā yā sūtrādideśanāpi mahāyānaṃ
SA20mavt:5196: etad eva mahāyānam anuttaraṃ tad anyasya viśiṣṭayānasyābhāvāt /
SA20mavt:5202: etad ānuttaryaṃ yathākramaṃ bodhisattvamārgaṃ tad adhiṣṭhānaṃ tat
SA20mavt:5204: etāvac ca buddhavacanenocyate - yaduta pratipattir ālambanaṃ tat
SA20mavt:5209: tatra kathaṃ pratipattyānuttaryam ityata āha - pratipattyānuttaryaṃ
SA20mavt:5213: sā ca pāramitāpratipattir mahāyāna eva nirdiṣṭā nānyatra yāna iti
SA20mavt:5215: sā ca pratipattir yiaḥ prakāraiḥ pāramitāsu prayujyamānasyānuttarā
SA20mavt:5220: sā ca pāramitāpratipattir na vijñāyate kathaṃ paramā yāvat katham
SA20mavt:5221: aviśiṣṭetyata āha - tatra paramā dvādaśātmikā // iti /
SA20mavt:5229: sampattir abhyudayaḥ sa ca dvidhākāraḥ - prāptaścāprāptaś ca /
SA20mavt:5230: tatra prāpte na sajjate aprāptaṃ na prārthayati
SA20mavt:5236: athavā loke hi dvividhā evodāra ucyate - yaḥ sthūlalakṣaḥ
SA20mavt:5239: ca dānādipāramitāsu prayujyata iti tat pratipatter audāryam ucyate /
SA20mavt:5242: tac ca na jñāyate kiyañciram ityata āha -
SA20mavt:5250: akṣayatvaṃ punaḥ kuta ityata āha - mahābodhipariṇāmanayā'tyantam
SA20mavt:5254: dharmakāyasya niṣpādanāt tasya cākṣayatvan nirupādhiśeṣe'pi nirvāṇe na
SA20mavt:5259: prabhūtam apyakṣayam ucyate vipākadānenā'tyantam aparyādānāt na
SA20mavt:5262: sattvadhātuvad akṣayāṇi bhavantītyataś ca sattvadhātuvan nātyantaṃ
SA20mavt:5270: tataḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ pratimuhūrtaṃ pratidivasaṃ ca nirantaraṃ
SA20mavt:5282: tadādhipatyena hi gaganam eva gañjo bhavatīti samādhir gaganagañja
SA20mavt:5283: ityabhidhīyate yasmāt tad ṛddhyā sarvopakaraṇāni gaganāj jāyante /
SA20mavt:5289: tena parameṇa nirvikalpena jñānena parigṛhītā dānādipratipattiḥ kathaṃ
SA20mavt:5290: tad anuparivartitatvāt tad ālambanatvāc cetyataḥ parametyucyate /
SA20mavt:5299: prathamāyāṃ hi bhūmau dharmadhātoḥ sarvatragatvāvabodhāl lokottarāḥ
SA20mavt:5301: laukikā evetyataḥ prathamāyāṃ bhūmau pratilambhaparamatety ucyate /
SA20mavt:5307: prathamā hi bhūmir bodhisattvānāṃ darśanamārgasaṅgṛhītā tat
SA20mavt:5317: daśamyāṃ hi bhūmau bodhisattvaḥ sarvabodhisattvacaryāniryāta iti tatra
SA20mavt:5322: sarvasya jagataḥ śāstā bhavatītyato buddhapariniṣpattyā niṣpattiḥ /
SA20mavt:5325: athavā pāramitānāṃ śaikṣabhūmisaṅgṛhītānāṃ prakarṣo daśamī bhūmiḥ
SA20mavt:5331: tataś ca paramārthena daśa pāramitā matāḥ / iti /
SA20mavt:5332: yata eṣā dvādaśavidhā paramatā bodhisattvānāṃ dānādiṣu saṃvidyate na
SA20mavt:5333: śrāvakādīnāṃ dānādiṣu tataḥ parametyanenārthena bodhisattvānām eva
SA20mavt:5334: dānādayo jñānaparyantā daśa pāramitā matā iti niruktinyāyeneti /
SA20mavt:5335: daśapāramitānāṃ yā pratipattiḥ sā punaḥ paramatety ucyate //5-4//
SA20mavt:5336: ekeṣām iti yeṣāṃ pāramitānāṃ nāmamātram api na vyutpannaṃ teṣāṃ tan
SA20mavt:5338: dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣaṃā vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā upāyatā /
SA20mavt:5339: praṇidānaṃ balaṃ jñānam etāḥ pāramitā daśa // iti /
SA20mavt:5343: anugraho'vidhātaś ca karma tasya ca marṣaṇaṃ /
SA20mavt:5357: sarvakāyavāgduścaritaviratir lokānuvṛttyā ca pratiṣiddhād vihitasya ca
SA20mavt:5359: asmin śīle vyavasthānāt sattveṣvapakāraṃ duṣṭopasaṃhāraṃ jīvitahetor
SA20mavt:5360: api svayaṃ na karoti nāpi kārayatīti /
SA20mavt:5379: tasyāś ca karma samyag avavādadānaṃ kleśaprahāṇaṃ
SA20mavt:5383: yasya dharmasya niṣpattaye vivṛddhaye prāptaye prahāṇāya vā yā yuktiḥ
SA20mavt:5384: sa tatropāyas tatra kauśalyaṃ vaicakṣaṇyam upāyakauśalyaṃ /
SA20mavt:5390: kuśalānukūlopapattiprārthanam atra praṇidhānam abhipretaṃ tasya janmani
SA20mavt:5391: janmani buddhotpādārāgaṇato dānādiṣu sadā pravartanaṃ karma /
SA20mavt:5406: yenābhiprāyikam arthaṃ tyaktvā yathārutam eva kalpayatyayaṃ
SA20mavt:5408: dānam adhikṛtya dānam ālambya yaḥ sūtrādiko dharmo deśitaḥ sa
SA20mavt:5426: manasikārapratipattir nānyatheti / mahāyāna iti na śrāvakayāne /
SA20mavt:5427: tatra hi svārthā eva dānādayo deśitā na svaparārthā yathā mahāyāne
SA20mavt:5433: te ca prāyeṇa cittasamatām asaktim anunnatim anupalaṃbhañcādhikṛtya
SA20mavt:5435: tatreya cittasamatā yā guṇyaguṇināṃ samam upakāraprārthanā /
SA20mavt:5436: tatreyam asaktir yo bhavabhogaprārthanāvigatasya parārtham eva dānādiṣu
SA20mavt:5438: tatreyam anunnatir yad dānādibhir nātmānaṃ manyate na parān paribhavati
SA20mavt:5446: sarvā hi pravṛttiḥ pralārtham ataḥ pṛcchati - sā triprākarayā
SA20mavt:5447: prajñayā manasikriyā kaṃ guṇam āvahatīty ata āha -
SA20mavt:5463: sā punar iyaṃ manasikārapratipattiḥ saparivārā vijñeyā na kevalā /
SA20mavt:5466: saṃyuktā dharmacaritaiḥ sā jñeyā daśabhiḥ punaḥ / iti /
SA20mavt:5470: tāni punar na jñāyanta ityata āha - katamad daśadhā dharmacaritam iti /
SA20mavt:5474: tatra mahāyānasya svayaṃ pareṇa vā lekhanaṃ cirasthityarthaṃ
SA20mavt:5482: mahatā yatnena yogyebhyo granthastyārthasya vā āviṣkaraṇaṃ prakāśanaṃ /
SA20mavt:5487: tatra lekhanā pūjanā dānaṃ śravaṇam ityebhiś caturbhiḥ padaiḥ kāyakarma
SA20mavt:5489: vācanam udgrahaṇaṃ prakāśanā svādhyāyanam ityebhiś caturbhiḥ padair
SA20mavt:5491: cintanā bhāvanā cetyābhyām api manaḥ karma pradarśitaṃ /
SA20mavt:5493: yadet daśaprakāraṃ dharmacaritam uktaṃ tata ekaikasmād dharmacaritādyaḥ
SA20mavt:5494: puṇyaskandhodbhavo na sa punaḥ svayaṃ pareṇa vā pramātuṃ śakyate
SA20mavt:5496: mahāyāna eva dharmacaritam atyarthaṃ mahāphalaṃ deśyate sūtreṣu na punaḥ
SA20mavt:5498: sūtreṣu dharmacaritaṃ mahāphalaṃ deśyata iti sambadhyate /
SA20mavt:5499: dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām iti mahāyāne dharmacaritam atyarthaṃ mahāpalaṃ
SA20mavt:5503: etad api na jñāyata ityataḥ pṛcchati - kathaṃ viśeṣāt kahtma akṣayatvād
SA20mavt:5510: evaṃ tāvad hetusamākhyānataḥ śrāvakayānān mahāyānasya viśiṣṭatvaṃ /
SA20mavt:5517: evaṃ nirvāṇe'pyanuparataṃ phalaṃ dyotanāc chrāvakayānān mahāyānaṃ
SA20mavt:5522: dānādayaś ca bodhisattvānāṃ dharmā anāsravakāyatvena parivṛttāḥ
SA20mavt:5524: śrāvakāṇān tu mārgasya kaulopamatvāt parinirvāṇe samucchidyata iti na
SA20mavt:5526: tasmādyuktaṃ mahāyānasaiva dharmacaritaṃ mahāphalaṃ na śrāvakayāna iti
SA20mavt:5537: ayam akāro bahuṣvartheṣu vartata iti kahtam avivikṣepteti na vijñāyata
SA20mavt:5539: vikṣepo'pi na jñāyāte kathaṃ ṣaḍvidha ityata āha - ṣaḍvidho vikṣepaḥ -
SA20mavt:5541: evam api prabhedamātraṃ darśitaṃ na vikṣepasvarūpam iti pṛcchati - sa eṣa
SA20mavt:5542: ṣaḍvidho vikṣepaḥ kiṃ lakṣaṇo veditavya ityata āha -
SA20mavt:5546: tatra vyutthānaṃ samādhitaḥ pañcabhir vijñānakāyair iti /
SA20mavt:5547: yadā hi samāhitasya punaḥ pañcānāṃ cakṣurādivijñānānām anyatamad
SA20mavt:5548: ekam utpadyate tadā samādhito vyutthito bhavati /
SA20mavt:5559: yadi samāhitastameva samādhiṃ tṛṣṇādinā kleśenāsvādayati tataḥ
SA20mavt:5568: atraiva kāraṇam āha - tan nimittaṃ kṛtvā prayogād iti /
SA20mavt:5578: etad uktaṃ bhavati - dauṣṭhulyaprabhāvito vikṣepo dauṣṭhulyavikṣepa iti /
SA20mavt:5591: atraiva kāraṇam āha - hīnayāna manasikārasamudācārād iti /
SA20mavt:5594: mahāyānamanasikārebhyo vikṣipatīti hīnaṃ cittaṃ manasikāravikṣepa ity
SA20mavt:5602: tatra yad yathā vyavasthitaṃ vastu tathā tatra jñānam aviparyāsaḥ /
SA20mavt:5603: tad vastuta punar na jñāyate katividhe vastunītyata āha -
SA20mavt:5608: idānīṃ teṣu vastuṣu yathā viparyāso bhavati tat pradarśanārtham āha -
SA20mavt:5619: etad uktaṃ bhavati - aviparyastāvilambitoccāraṇam atra vyañjanānāṃ
SA20mavt:5620: saṃyoga iṣyate na tu vyañjanānāṃ parasparasaṃśleṣaṇam iti /
SA20mavt:5622: yadi cāsya vastuna idaṃ nāmeti saṅketo'bhyasto bhavati evam anena
SA20mavt:5627: so'viparyāso vyañjane veditavya iti saṃvṛttyā na tu paramārthataḥ /
SA20mavt:5638: kah punar atra pratibhāsārtha ityata āha - tadākārotpattita iti /
SA20mavt:5641: tathā ca na vidyate yathā pratibhāsate advayaprakṛtitvāt /
SA20mavt:5642: iti evaṃ bhrāntivijñānotpattinimittabhūte'rthe yad darśanaṃ sa
SA20mavt:5644: arthasya sattvena varjita ityatraiva kāraṇam āha -
SA20mavt:5653: ayam api saṃvṛttā'viparyāsa ucyate na paramārthataḥ savikalpatvāt /
SA20mavt:5662: vāṅmanobhyāṃ yad abhilapanaṃ sa jalpa ity ucyate /
SA20mavt:5671: punaś ca jalpasya tat sanniśrayeṇotpāter āśrayo bhavatītyayaṃ
SA20mavt:5673: sa tu manaskāro na vijṇyāte yasminn aviparyāsa ityataḥ pṛcchati - katam
SA20mavt:5688: evaṃ tad dauṣṭhulyaṃ sukhena varjitaṃ bhavatīti // [p.165]
SA20mavt:5698: etad eva pradarśayann āha -yathā māyā svātmanyavidyamānena
SA20mavt:5701: kiṃ tarhi na ca naivāsti tad bhrāntimātrāstitvād iti /
SA20mavt:5704: tathārtho'pi na cāsti yathā samprakhyāti grāhyagrāhakatvena tathā
SA20mavt:5708: ādiśabdena marīcisvapnodakacandrādayo dṛṣṭāntā yathāyogaṃ veditavyā iti /
SA20mavt:5710: tathā santi na ca santyeva bhrāntimātrāstitvāt evam artho'pīti
SA20mavt:5713: evaṃ yan māyādyupamārthadarśanāt sattvāsattvapakṣayor avisāraṃ cetasaḥ
SA20mavt:5717: yadyevaṃ katham avisāre'viparyāsa ityata āha - tena
SA20mavt:5722: ayam api saṃvṛttyairvāviparyāso na paramārthataḥ tasya nirvikalpakatvāt
SA20mavt:5726: sarvam idaṃ nāmamātraṃ yadidaṃ cakṣūrūpaṃ yāvan manodharmā iti /
SA20mavt:5729: na ca prajñaptyasyārthasya prajñapter vā svabhāvo'sti /
SA20mavt:5733: tasmāc cakṣūrupam ityādyasyātat svabhāvatvān nāmamātram eva
SA20mavt:5734: cakṣūrūpaṃ yāvan manodharmā ityevaṃ yaj jñānaṃ sarvavikalpānāṃ
SA20mavt:5739: tatra na jñāyate kiṃ paramārthe svalakṣaṇe āhosvit saṃvṛtāv ityataḥ
SA20mavt:5746: saṃvṛttyā yato nedaṃ nāmamātram iti gṛhyate abhilāpadvāreṇa
SA20mavt:5747: dharmasvarūpe saṅkalpapravṛtteḥ ayam api saṃvṛtyaiva na paramārthato
SA20mavt:5753: na hi dharmanairātmyena vinā kaścid rūpyarūpī vā dharmo vidyate /
SA20mavt:5756: tasmād dharmadhātuḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāmānyaṃ lakṣaṇam iti /
SA20mavt:5757: sarvadharmeṣv apṛthaktvena tat sat sāmānyalakṣaṇam ucyate /
SA20mavt:5758: yadevaṃ jñānamayaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇo'viparyāsaḥ saṃvṛttyā na tu
SA20mavt:5761: tad anena cāviparyāsena bodhisattvo viśuddhyālambanakuśalo bhavati
SA20mavt:5768: evaṃ darśanabhedavaśād viśeṣo bhavati na tv arthād iti /
SA20mavt:5772: viparyasta manaskāraprahāṇaṃ tasya dharmadhātor aviśuddhiḥ tat prahāṇaṃ
SA20mavt:5776: yadevaṃ jñānamayam aviśuddhau viśuddhau cāviparyāso yathākramam iti /
SA20mavt:5777: viparyasta manaskārāprahāṇaṃ tasya dharmadhātor aviśuddhir iti
SA20mavt:5779: tasya prahāṇaṃ viśuddhir iti viśuddhāv aviparyāsaḥ /
SA20mavt:5790: apyetadāgantukam aviśuddhir viśuddhiś ca paścād iti /
SA20mavt:5792: paścāc ca pratipakṣodayena tat prahāṇād viśuddhiḥ /
SA20mavt:5796: prakṛtiviśuddhasyāviśuddhir āgantukī bhaved viśuddhes tu nityaviśuddhitaḥ
SA20mavt:5798: yā malavigamatātmatayā viśuddhiḥ sātra vivakṣiteti nāyaṃ doṣaḥ /
SA20mavt:5799: ata evoktaṃ viśuddhiś ca paścād iti /
SA20mavt:5800: yadevaṃ dharmadhātor jñānam etad dharmadhātor viśuddhi viśuddhyor
SA20mavt:5802: ayam api saṃvṛttyā na tu paramārthataḥ /
SA20mavt:5806: saṅkleśaś ca viśuddhiś ca dharmapudgalayor na hi /
SA20mavt:5808: na hi pudgalasya saṅkleśo na viśuddhiḥ nāpi dharmasya /
SA20mavt:5810: atraiva kāraṇam āha - yasmān na pudgalo'sti na dharmaḥ /
SA20mavt:5812: yaḥ saṅkleśavyavadānavyatirekeṇa vidyate yasya saṅkleśo vyavadānaṃ vā
SA20mavt:5813: parikalpayituṃ yujyate yat pṛthaktvena ca saṃkleśaviśuddhī syātāṃ sa
SA20mavt:5815: dharmo'pi parikalpitātmako naivāsti ekasminn vastuny ekaparikalpapravṛtteḥ
SA20mavt:5821: yadi paratantrasyāpi neṣyate kasya te syātāṃ ?
SA20mavt:5823: dharmadhātoḥ saṅkleśaviśuddhī bhavata ity ayam adoṣaḥ /
SA20mavt:5824: dharmadhātor apyatanmayasyaiva te vyavasthāpyete dharmadhātau tayor
SA20mavt:5826: tataḥ na saṃkleśapakṣe kasyacid hānir na vyavadānapakṣe vā kaścid viśeṣo
SA20mavt:5827: yatas trāso vā syān mānovetyamatrāse'nunnatau cāviparyāsa iti /
SA20mavt:5828: anye tvāhuḥ - na saṅkleśapakṣe kasyacid hānir na vyavadānapakṣe
SA20mavt:5830: yataḥ punas ta evaṃ bhavatas tatra kim iti trāso bhavaty ayaṃ me nāstīti
SA20mavt:5831: kim iti māno bhavaty ayaṃ me viśeṣa iti / [p.169]
SA20mavt:5832: apare tu manyate - pudgalas tāvan naivāsti /
SA20mavt:5835: kiṃ tarhi pratītyasamutpādamātram etat saṅkleśavyavadānam iti /
SA20mavt:5836: ayam api saṃvṛttyā na tu paramārthataḥ tasya nirvikalpakatvāt /
SA20mavt:5839: anena cāviparyāsena sarvam āvaraṇaṃ prahāya nirāvaraṇo niryātītyanye
SA20mavt:5842: anyaḥ punar āha - ya ete vyañjane'rthe manaskāre'visāre svalakṣaṇe
SA20mavt:5845: tatra vyañjanārthāviparyāsāv atra parikalpitaṃ svabhāvam adhikṛtya /
SA20mavt:5847: atattvaviṣayatve'pi satyevaṃ tad dvayam aviparyāsa eva /
SA20mavt:5852: kuta etan nirvikalpasya jñānasya bhāvābhāvayor vikṣepavigatatvād
SA20mavt:5857: āgantuke'viparyāso dharmadhātāv eva tasya hy ākāśavat
SA20mavt:5858: prakṛtiviśuddhasya cittasaṅkleśāc cittaviśuddhyā cāgantukam etad ubhayaṃ
SA20mavt:5862: evam ete daśa viparyāsāḥ svabhāvatraye veditavyāḥ /
SA20mavt:5864: ete cānantaroktā daśaviparyāsāḥ sūtrokteṣu daśasu vajrapadeṣu
SA20mavt:5871: anantaroktam aviparyāsajñānaṃ tac ca vajram ebhiḥ pratīyate avagamyata
SA20mavt:5874: atha punarvyañjanārthamanaskārādaya eva padaśabdhenocyante tato vajrasya
SA20mavt:5876: athava durbhedatayā vajravadetānyeva padāni vajra padānītyuccayante /
SA20mavt:5880: tatra vyañjanānām arthasattvam asattvañca sadasattetyato vyañjaneṣv
SA20mavt:5883: sa ca tathā na vidyata ityayam atrāviparyāsa ityarthāviparyāso
SA20mavt:5901: evam ete daśāviparyāsā daśasu vajrapadeṣu yathākramaṃ yojayitavyāḥ /
SA20mavt:5904: teṣāntu caturdhā vyavasthānaṃ svabhāvataḥ ālambanataḥ avikalpanataḥ
SA20mavt:5908: tatrādau bhavānyādyāni tāni punaḥ sadasattā'viparyāsa āśrayaśceti /
SA20mavt:5913: pariniṣpannasya sadasattāyā sadasattayā nirdeśa iti kecit /
SA20mavt:5914: kathaṃ sadasal lakṣaṇatvāt pariniṣpannasya sadasattayā'bhidhānam ityeke /
SA20mavt:5916: viparyayāc ca nirarthakatvaṃ pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvo'nabhilāpya iti
SA20mavt:5918: atas tat sadasattā pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāva ity uktam ityanye /
SA20mavt:5920: viparyāsapratipakṣālambanatvāc ca pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāva ity ucyate /
SA20mavt:5921: so'rthaḥ kalpitasvabhāvasya bhavati na tu parikalpitaḥ /
SA20mavt:5923: anye tv āhuḥ - sadasattā'viparyastatvāt pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāva ukta iti
SA20mavt:5927: hetutvād āśraya ity ucyate phalatvāt paratantra iti /
SA20mavt:5929: avikalpanata ityatra vigrahabhedād āha - yena ca vikalpayati nirvikalpena
SA20mavt:5930: jñānena yac ca na vikalpayati prakṛtiprabhāsvaratāṃ /
SA20mavt:5931: tatrārya vigrahabhedaḥ - na vikalpayatyanenetyavikalpanaṃ na vikalpyate
SA20mavt:5934: evam avikalpanatā dvābhyāṃ vajrapadābhyāṃ paridīpiteti darśayati /
SA20mavt:5935: tad anena jñeyajñānavyavasthānaṃ yathākramaṃ veditavyaṃ yad uta tribhiḥ
SA20mavt:5940: atra kiñcid vajrapradaṃ codyasya parihāra eva /
SA20mavt:5944: tasmācodyaparihāraś ca codyasya parihāraś ca codyaparihārau
SA20mavt:5946: tatra codyaṃ yadyete parikalpitaparatantralakṣaṇā dharmā na saṃvidyante
SA20mavt:5949: ata saṃvidyante dharmāṇāṃ prakṛtiprabhāsvaratā na yujyate
SA20mavt:5953: yathā māyākṛtaṃ na saṃvidyata upalabhyate ceti /
SA20mavt:5954: na hi māyopalabhyatayā saṃvidyate tato'pyevaṃ saṃvidyata iti jñātuṃ
SA20mavt:5956: yadi parkṛtiprabhāsvaratā dharmāṇāṃ tat kathaṃ pūrvaṃ saṃkleśaḥ paścād
SA20mavt:5963: tad apagamāc ca vyavadānam iti yadyaprameyabuddhotpāde satyaprameyāṇāṃ
SA20mavt:5966: ca na saṃsārasamucchedo na nirvāṇavṛddhri veti codyaṃ /
SA20mavt:5969: parimāṇavato hi vastuno hāniḥ samucchedo vā prajñāyate aprameyaś ca
SA20mavt:5971: tasya hānir api na prajñāte kuta eva samucchedaḥ prajñāsyeta ākāśavat
SA20mavt:5972: vyavadānasyāpyaprameyatvād viśeṣa eva nāsti tasya kathaṃ vṛddhir
SA20mavt:5975: dvitīyaṃ śarīravyavasthānam iti vajrapadānām ity adhikṛtaṃ /
SA20mavt:5976: yatra yā ca yato bhrāntir abhrāntir yā ca yatra ca /
SA20mavt:5977: bhrāntyabhrāntiphale caiva paryantaś ca tayor iti //
SA20mavt:5981: tatra yatra bhrāntir iti sadasattāyāṃ vyañjanānāṃ
SA20mavt:5984: yā ca bhrāntir iti viparyāso bhrāntiḥ /
SA20mavt:5986: yato bhrāntir ityāśrayād bhrāntir āśrayaḥ punar jalpaparibhāvito
SA20mavt:5988: abhrāntir yā ceti māyādivad arthataḥ sadasattāvisāro'bhrāntiḥ /
SA20mavt:5994: bhrāntyabhrāntiphale caiveti tatra bhrāntiphalaṃ hi saṅkleśaḥ /
SA20mavt:5998: evakārakaraṇaṃ tat phale saṅkleśo vyavadānam ityanenaivokte
SA20mavt:5999: ākāśopamatayā tu paśyati dharmadhātor yasya bhrāntyabhrāntiphalaṃ tat
SA20mavt:6002: paryantaś ca tayor iti saṅkleśavyavadānayoḥ paryanto nirvāṇaṃ /
SA20mavt:6010: akalpanā prakṛtyā ca bhāsvaratvaṃ sadaiva hi //
SA20mavt:6030: pṛcchati - antadvayavarjane pratipattiḥ katametyata āha - yā ratnakūṭe
SA20mavt:6033: tadyathā - kāśyapa iha mahāratnakūṭe dharmaparyāye śikṣitukāmena
SA20mavt:6042: katam asyāntasya varjanān madhyamā pratipatter jñātavyetyarthaḥ /
SA20mavt:6050: tatra rūpādibhyaḥ pṛthaktvam ātmana ityantaḥ ekatvam ityantaḥ /
SA20mavt:6051: tatra ye rūpādīn sknadhānāyatanāni dhātūṃś ca nityātmana
SA20mavt:6052: upabhogavastutvena kalpayanti tad rūpādibhyaḥ pṛthaktvamātmana ityantaḥ /
SA20mavt:6053: ye punar ādhyātmikān saṃskārān rūpādīnām ātmatvena pratipannā yaḥ
SA20mavt:6054: paśyati śṛṇoti jānāti sa ātmeti bāhyāṃścātmīyatvena kalpayanti tad
SA20mavt:6055: rūpādibhya ekatvam ātmana ityantaḥ yat sūtryate - sa jīvas taccharīram
SA20mavt:6059: madhyamā pratipad yad dharmātraṃ viṣayabhūtaṃ jñānaṃ /
SA20mavt:6060: etad eva pradarśayann āha - yā nātmapratyavekṣā
SA20mavt:6063: kuta eva tasya rūpādibhyas tattvam anyatvaṃ vā gṛhyata iti ?
SA20mavt:6066: na sarvasya sarvaparyāyavyutpattir ityataḥ sarveṣāṃ tadarthāvabodhārthaṃ
SA20mavt:6071: te hi parikalpitarūpān vastutvenābhiniveśya nityatvena kalpayanti
SA20mavt:6082: yan na rūpādīn rūpādiṣv eva nityatvenānityatvena cānugacchati /
SA20mavt:6087: ātmeti śabdena pudgalasamāropānta iti skandhadhātvāyatana vyatiriktam
SA20mavt:6088: avyatiriktaṃ vā vandhyāputravad asantam ātmānaṃ dravyataḥ paśyataḥ
SA20mavt:6092: ātmanastv asattvāt kathaṃ nairātmyam ity apavādānta āpadyata ityata
SA20mavt:6093: āha - prajñaptisato'pyapavādāt nairātmyam apavādānta iti sambadhyate
SA20mavt:6094: sa punar dharmāṇāṃ santāno yasmin hetuphalasambandhaḥ prajñāyate /
SA20mavt:6098: tasyāḥ punar yasyā madhyamāyāḥ pratipado nirūpaṇārtham āha -
SA20mavt:6106: yathā pratibhāsate yathā vā'bhilapyate cittaṃ tathaiva bhūtaṃ vidyata
SA20mavt:6110: tasya hi grāhyagrāhakarahitātmanā nirabhilāpyena ca vidyamānam
SA20mavt:6115: sā yatra nacittaṃ na cetanā na mano na vijñānam iti /
SA20mavt:6117: yatra vā viṣaye na cittaṃ sāsravavāsanābhiścittātmakaṃ pravartate na
SA20mavt:6118: cetanā'bhisaṃskāralakṣaṇā na mano manyanākāraṃ na vijñānañca
SA20mavt:6130: tatra yathaivākuśalāḥ kuśalāś ca dharmāḥ pratibhāsante'bhilapyante ca
SA20mavt:6131: tathaiva saṃkleśo vyavadānañceti darśanaṃ vipakṣāntaḥ pratipakṣāntaś ca
SA20mavt:6140: na madhyamā'tra pratipaj jñāyata ityata āha -
SA20mavt:6147: astīti śāśvatāntaḥ nāstītyucchedāntaḥ tayor eva pudgaladharmayoḥ /
SA20mavt:6150: tat parivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yad anayor antayor madhyamiti/
SA20mavt:6154: yo'hyabhūtaparikalpavad dharmadhātuvadvā jñeyamn abhidheyaṃ ca vastu
SA20mavt:6161: ataścāstitva nāstitvayor madhyaṃ dravyaḥ paramārthaś ca nasti
SA20mavt:6165: evaṃ vidyā saṃskārā asaṃskṛtañca tat pratipakṣo grāhyaṃ
SA20mavt:6167: atra ca yāvaj jarāmaraṇam iti paryantagrahāṇād
SA20mavt:6170: evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ bhavo
SA20mavt:6181: anye tv anutpattimatvād asaṃskṛtam aṣṭavidham apyatra manyante /
SA20mavt:6185: nirodho na vijñāyate kiṃ bhāvaḥ kāraṇaṃ vetyāha - yena tan nāmarūpaṃ
SA20mavt:6189: vidyā cā'vidyā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram ityetad evātra jñānaṃ
SA20mavt:6197: tatra kṛṣṇapakṣe dvādaśabhavāṅgāni avidyā yāvaj jarāmaraṇaṃ /
SA20mavt:6200: atra ca nirydhyante'enā'vidyādaya iti tat pratipakṣabhūto mārga eva
SA20mavt:6204: sā ca na vijñāyata ityata āha - vidyā cā'vidyā cādvayam etad iti /
SA20mavt:6205: kathaṃ vidyā cāvidyā ca yāvaj jarāmaraṇaṃ tan nirodhaścā'dvayam ityata
SA20mavt:6210: evaṃ saṃskārāṇām asaṃskṛtasya ca vijñānasya tan nirodhasya ca yāvaj
SA20mavt:6213: etad eva jñānaṃ vidyā cāvidyā cādvayam etadavaidhīkāram iti na
SA20mavt:6216: na tannirodhaḥ prāptavya iti yadevaṃ jñānam etadavaidhīkāraṃ // [p.179]
SA20mavt:6220: karmāpi kleśādhipatyanirvṛttatvāj janmahetutvāt svayam api ca kasyacit
SA20mavt:6226: rāgadveṣamohā eva nimittaṃ śokādihetutvāt punar bhavahetutvāc ca /
SA20mavt:6227: anye tvāhuḥ - rāgādīnāṃ nimittaṃ tad anukūlā indriyārthāḥ ayoniśo
SA20mavt:6243: yena jñānena karma punarbhavann asya nā'bhisaṃskaroti taj jñānaṃ
SA20mavt:6253: yasya pratipakṣo jñānā'jātir jñānānutpādo jñānāsvabhāvatā ca /
SA20mavt:6258: vandhyāputravad asattvād asvabhāvo bhāvaprabandha iti yaj jñānaṃ taj
SA20mavt:6265: anye tu manyante tathatā mārgo nirvāṇañca vyavadānaṃ /
SA20mavt:6275: etena trividhena saṅkleśena yathāyogaṃ yāvan na śūnyatādayaḥ kriyanta iti /
SA20mavt:6284: ato jñeyaśūnyatādayo dharmāḥ prakṛtyaiva śūnyatādaya iti
SA20mavt:6287: jñānaśūnyatayā jñeyaśūnyatā dṛṣṭisaṃkleśena vimuktā virahitā na
SA20mavt:6289: evaṃ jñānānimittena jñeyānimittaṃ rāgādinimittair virahitaṃ na
SA20mavt:6295: jñānājāthyā jñeyajātirṇaṃ kriyate, jātiśūnyatāyāḥ prakṛutyai vā
SA20mavt:6301: athavā trividhena saṃkleśena yathāyogam iti vistaraḥ /
SA20mavt:6303: dharmāṇāṃ yasya dharmasya yena saṃkleśabhedena yogaḥ sa dharmo na
SA20mavt:6308: yasmāt te prakṛtyaiva śūnyatādayo dharmā dharmadhātoḥ
SA20mavt:6310: tatra dṛṣṭayo na jñānaśūnyatayā śūnyāḥ kriyante tāsāṃ prakṛtyaiva
SA20mavt:6314: evaṃ yāvat punar bhavaprabandho jñānāsvabhāvatayā nāsvabhāvaḥ
SA20mavt:6316: yataścaitad evam ato yadi dharmadhātuḥ saṃkliśyate vā viśuddhyate veti
SA20mavt:6318: kiṃ kāraṇam ityato bravīti - prakṛtyasaṃkliṣṭasya saṃkleśaśuddhyabhāvād
SA20mavt:6320: etasyāntasya parivarjanārthaṃ madhyamāpratipad yan na śūnyatāyā
SA20mavt:6322: tad vipakṣeṇa paratantrasvabhāvena dṛṣṭyādikena śūnyān virahitān karoti
SA20mavt:6323: api tv anutpannāyām api vidyāyāṃ parikalpitena svabhāvena
SA20mavt:6325: evaṃ yannānimittena dharmānanimittān karoti dharmā evānimittāḥ
SA20mavt:6328: yaivaṃ pratyavekṣā iyam ucyate kāśyapa dharmāṇāṃ bhūtapratyavekṣeti /
SA20mavt:6329: evaṃ vidyāstitvaṃ tad vipakṣāstitvāṃ ca parikalpitasvabhāvavigataṃ
SA20mavt:6331: yo'yam anukrānto vikalpaprabhedastasmād ayam aparaḥ saptavidho
SA20mavt:6335: katham ityato bravīti - pudgalo'sti yasya vināśāya śūnyatā nairātmyam
SA20mavt:6337: yadi śūnyatayā dharmān prakṛtiśūnyatvān na śūnyān karoti tena tarhi
SA20mavt:6341: tasmād avaśyaṃ pudgalāstitvaṃ vā nairātmyaṃ bhāvo vā pratipattavya iti
SA20mavt:6345: na khalu punaḥ kāśyapa pudgalavināśāya śūnyatā /
SA20mavt:6346: api tu śūnyataiva śūnyeti vistareṇa sūtrapāṭhaḥ /
SA20mavt:6347: tatra na saṅkliṣṭa pudugalavināśāya na oyavadānpudgalothpādāya
SA20mavt:6349: tu śūnyataiva śūnyā na tu pudgalena satkāyadṛṣṭisamāropitena
SA20mavt:6351: evañca kṛtvā pudgaladharmātmanā na bhāvaḥ śūunyatā tad rahitatvāt /
SA20mavt:6352: pariniṣpannena nābhāvaḥ tac ca śūnyatāyāḥ pariniṣpannātmakatvaṃ
SA20mavt:6358: yasmāc caivaṃ bhāvābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā tasmād āha - śūnyatāṃ
SA20mavt:6362: katham ityata āha - praheyaprahāṇakalpanayā śūnyatāyās trasanāditi /
SA20mavt:6368: sa yadi prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tataḥ pudgalavan na praheyaḥ syāt /
SA20mavt:6369: tataś ca praheyābhāvāt prahāṇābhāva iti śūnyatāyām uttrāso jāyate
SA20mavt:6372: rūpavedanādayo hi dharmā yathaiva vijñānātmani viparivartante tathaiva
SA20mavt:6373: te dravyataḥ santītyabhiniviṣṭāḥ teṣāṃ kalpitarūpāṇāṃ rūpādīnām
SA20mavt:6376: tadyathā - kāśyapa kaścid eva puruṣa ākāśajo bhītaḥ sorastāḍaṃ
SA20mavt:6378: takiṃ manyase kāśyapa śakyam ākāśam apanetuṃ ?
SA20mavt:6380: bhagavān āha - evam eva kāśyapa ete śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ śūnyatāyām
SA20mavt:6383: śūnyatāyām eva hi te kāśyapa vicaranti tasyā eva bibhyantīti /
SA20mavt:6384: etad uktaṃ bhavati - yathākāśaṃ sarvarūpānugatatvād apanetum aśakyam
SA20mavt:6385: evaṃ sarvadharmeṣu sarvakālaṃ śūnyatā vyavasthitetyapanetuṃ na śakyate /
SA20mavt:6386: na ca dharmaprahāṇena śūnyatā vyavasthāpayitum ataścāyam
SA20mavt:6388: trāsye'pi kalpo'ntaḥ tataś ca trāsyād bhaye'pi /
SA20mavt:6393: tasmād yad aniṣṭaphalaṃ tasmin strāsye tasmiṃśca bhaye yo vikalpayati
SA20mavt:6396: bālā hi parikalpitarūpādīn vastutaḥ kalpayitvā tebhyo bhayam aniṣṭaṃ
SA20mavt:6398: tataśca duḥkhabhīrutayā tebhyo rūpādibhyas tan nimittebhyaś ca bhayāt
SA20mavt:6402: tadyathā - kāśyapa citrakaraḥ svayam eva bhīṣaṇaṃ yakṣarūpaṃ kṛtvā
SA20mavt:6403: tasmād eva bhītasrasto'dhomukho nipatya sammohaṃ nigacchet /
SA20mavt:6404: evam eva kāśyapa sarvabālapṛthagjanāḥ svayam eva
SA20mavt:6405: rūpaśabdagandharasasparśān kṛtvā tebhyaḥ saṃsāre bhrāmyanti na ca tān
SA20mavt:6407: yathā ca citrakaraḥ svayaṃkṛte bhīṣaṇake yakṣarūpe mithyāvikalpena
SA20mavt:6408: bhūtayakṣabhāvam adhyāropya tasmād bhītaḥ sammoham āpadyate /
SA20mavt:6409: evaṃ sarva eva bālā mithyāvikalpaprasrutāḥ svayaṃ kṛtair iti vikalpitaiḥ
SA20mavt:6412: śrāvako hi śūnyatāyām akṛtaparicayatvāc chūnyatāyās trasyati /
SA20mavt:6415: nānayor arthaviśeṣo'styapi tu vargadvayavaśād dvayābhidhānam ityanye /
SA20mavt:6418: pūrvaka ātmagrāhapratipakṣeṇa ayaṃ punar dharmagrāhapratipakṣeṇeti kecit
SA20mavt:6421: katham ete grāhyarūpādayas tad grāhakāśca vijñānakāyāḥ
SA20mavt:6422: svalakṣaṇataḥ kāryataś ca gṛhyamāṇā ātmādivad adhyāropitātmāno
SA20mavt:6426: tadyathā kāśyapa māyākāraḥ puruṣo māyākṛtaṃ nirmimīti /
SA20mavt:6427: atha sa māyānirmitas tameva māyākāraṃ khādet /
SA20mavt:6428: evam eva kāśyapa yogācāro bhikṣur yadyadevārambaṇaṃ manaskaroti tat
SA20mavt:6429: sarvam asya riktam eva khyātīti vistaraḥ /
SA20mavt:6433: arthābhāve vijñaptyasambhavād ityetad atra sādharmyam iti /
SA20mavt:6437: yathā nirmito nirmātāraṃ bhakṣyedevam arthābhāvajñānaṃ tadeva
SA20mavt:6448: atha punar asamyaktvalakṣaṇam eva evam api mithyātvam evopapadyate
SA20mavt:6451: tadyathā kāśYapa kāṣṭhadvayaṃ pratītyagnir jāyata iti jātaś ca
SA20mavt:6453: evam eva kāśyapa bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ pratītyāryaṃ prajñendriyaṃ jāyate
SA20mavt:6454: jātaṃ ca tām eva bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ dahatīti /
SA20mavt:6455: amamātrārthaḥ - yathā kāṣṭhadvayād anagnilakṣaṇād agnir jāyate
SA20mavt:6459: jātaś ca tām eva bhūtaparatyavekṣāṃ dahati /
SA20mavt:6461: sā hi vibhāvanād eva dagdheva dagdhety ucyate vikṛtidarśanāt /
SA20mavt:6466: katham ityata āha - jñānasya buddhipūrvāṃ kriyāṃ niḥsāmarthyaṃ vā
SA20mavt:6469: jñānam idam ajñānaṃ prajahāmītyavadhārya tat prahāṇāya pravartata
SA20mavt:6474: tadyathā kāśyapa tailapradyote kṛte tamo'ndhakāraṃ vigacchati na khalu
SA20mavt:6475: punaḥ kāśyapa tailapradyotasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ sarvam andhakāraṃ
SA20mavt:6477: api tu khalu tailapradyotaṃ pratītya tamo'ndhakāraṃ vigacchatīti /
SA20mavt:6478: evam eva kāśyapa jñāna utpanne'jñānaṃ vigacchati na khalu punaḥ
SA20mavt:6479: kāśyapa jñānasyaivaṃ bhavaty aham ajñānaṃ vidhamāmīti /
SA20mavt:6480: api tu khalu jñānaṃ pratītyājñānaṃ vigacchatīti /
SA20mavt:6481: etad uktaṃ bhavati - yathā pradīpo vyāpāraśūnyas
SA20mavt:6482: tamo'ndhakāravyudāsābhiprāyarahitaś ca punar yasmin pradeśe kriyate
SA20mavt:6484: evam eva yasmin santāne nirvikalpaṃ jñānam utpadyate tat
SA20mavt:6485: sattāmātrasadbhāvād eva tasmāt santānād ajñānaṃ vigacchati
SA20mavt:6491: katham ityata āha - yadi pratipakṣasyānutpattiṃ vā kalpayati yatheyatā
SA20mavt:6492: kālena notpannapūrvaḥ pratipakṣas tathedānīm api notpatsyata iti ayam
SA20mavt:6495: na hy ajñāne jñānapratiyoginyavasthita eva jñānam utpattuṃ samarthaṃ /
SA20mavt:6496: athāpi kathañcid utpadyeta tathāpi cirakālaviruddhatvād ajñānasya na
SA20mavt:6497: jñānena tat kṣaṇikena vyudāsaḥ śakyate kartuṃ /
SA20mavt:6501: tadyathā kāśyapa gṛhe vā layane vā'vacarake vā varṣasahasrasyātyayān
SA20mavt:6503: atha tatra kaścid eva puruṣas tailapradyotaṃ kuryāt /
SA20mavt:6504: tat kiṃ manyase kāśyapāpi tu tamo'ndhākārasyaivaṃ bhaved
SA20mavt:6506: āha - no bhagavan na hi tamo'ndhakārasya śaktir asti tailapradyote kṛte na
SA20mavt:6508: bhagavān āha - evam eva kāśyapa kalpaśatasahasrasañcito'pi karmakleśa
SA20mavt:6519: antadvayavarjanapratipatter anantaraṃ viśiṣṭā cāviśiṣṭā ca pratipattir
SA20mavt:6523: viśiṣṭā cāviśiṣṭā ca jñeyā daśasu bhūmiṣu //
SA20mavt:6524: tāsu daśasu bhūmiṣv ekaikaśo dviprakārāpi pratipattiḥ /
SA20mavt:6525: katham ityata āha - yasyāṃ bhūmau yā pāramitā'tiriktatarā bhavatīti
SA20mavt:6527: yasyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau vyavasthito boshisattvo yasyāṃ pāramitāyām
SA20mavt:6528: ādhikyena prayujyate sā tasyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmāv itarābhyaḥ
SA20mavt:6533: aviśeṣeṇa śeṣāsu sarvāsu pāramitāsu tasyāṃ bhūmau samudāgacchatīti
SA20mavt:6536: na ca śeṣāsu na samudāgacchati yathābalaṃ yathābhājamānam iti /
SA20mavt:6537: evaṃ śeṣāsu bhūmiṣu yathāsūtraṃ nirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
SA20mavt:6545: ityetad dvādaśavidham ālambanaṃ vyavasthānālambanam ārabhya yāvat
SA20mavt:6548: tatra prathamaṃ ye pāramitādayo dharmāste'pi buddhair bodhisattvaiś ca
SA20mavt:6554: tayā vyavatiṣṭhate sā vā'tra vyavasthānam iti
SA20mavt:6562: yathākramam iti prathamaṃ sādhyālambanaṃ dvitīyaṃ sādhanālambanaṃ /
SA20mavt:6572: tat punaḥ prathamam eva dvayaṃ vyavasthānālambanaṃ
SA20mavt:6590: navamaṃ bhāvanāmārgasya yāvat saptamyāṃ bhūmāv iti /
SA20mavt:6594: daśamaṃ tatraiva laukikalokottarasya mārgasyālambanam iti prakṛtaṃ /
SA20mavt:6599: sa eva bhāvanāmārga ucyate saptamyām eva bhūmau /
SA20mavt:6610: anyaḥ punar āha - mārgaprakarṣasyaiva mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhedaṃ kṛtvā
SA20mavt:6612: tadeva hi prathamadvayaṃ tasyāṃ tasyām avasthāyāṃ tat tadālambananāma
SA20mavt:6616: taccaitad ālambanadvayaṃ tasyāṃ tasyāṃ jñānāvasthāyāṃ tat tan nāma
SA20mavt:6622: navamyāṃ daśamyāṃ buddhabhūmau ca prakarṣāprāptaṃ lokottaraṃ jñānaṃ
SA20mavt:6629: tayā tayā pratipattyā samudānīyata iti samudāgamaḥ /
SA20mavt:6630: tad anyebhyaḥ samudāgamebhyo viśiṣṭatvāt tataścānyasya samudāgamasya
SA20mavt:6635: tatra pratyayāvaikalyam ārabhya yāvad bodhisandarśanam ityeṣa daśavidhaḥ
SA20mavt:6639: teṣv āhṛteṣu gotraṃ samudāgaccyati sphītaṃ tad viśiṣṭataraṃ
SA20mavt:6641: tat punaḥ satpuruṣasaṃsevā saddharmaśravaṇaṃ yoniśo manaskāra ityevam
SA20mavt:6649: śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne vā cittam asya na krāmatyevam asya tad
SA20mavt:6657: sa yatra nāsti sā nyāmā nivātavadanāsravā bhūmiḥ
SA20mavt:6660: tathā hy utpannadarśanamārgo niyato bhavati sugatau nirvāṇe ceti /
SA20mavt:6666: anye tvāhuḥ - evam asya sattvaparipākaḥ samudāgato bhavatiḥ yadyanena
SA20mavt:6674: yānānuttaryasya piṇḍārtha iti pūrvaṃ piṇḍārthākhyānaprayojanam ucyate
SA20mavt:6675: samāsatas trividham ānuttaryam iti vyāsato'nantam iti /
SA20mavt:6691: saṃyuktā dharmacaritaiḥ sā jñeyā daśabhiḥ punaḥ / iti /
SA20mavt:6696: yad arthañca madhyamayā pratipadā niryāṇārtham ityantadvayavarjane
